original: skad cig ma bcu drug pa ni bsgom pa'i lam ste /
analyzed: skad cig ma bcu drug pa ni bsgom pa'i lam ste /
translated: The sixteenth moment is the path of meditation.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i gnas skabs yin no //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i gnas skabs yin no //
translated: It is the state of stream entry.

original: de la bsgom pa'i lam gyi bar chad med pa'i lam dang / rnam par grol ba'i lam gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la bsgom pa'i lam gyi bar chad med pa'i lam dang / rnam par grol ba'i lam gang zhe na /
translated: What is the uninterrupted path and the path of liberation of the path of cultivation?

original: de la re zhig 'dod par gtogs pa'i 'dod chags dang / khong khro ba dang / nga rgyal dang / ma rig pa 'dam du sbam pa'i tshul du bsdus nas rim pa dgur phye ste /
analyzed: de la re zhig 'dod par gtogs pa'i 'dod chags dang / khong khro ba dang / nga rgyal dang / ma rig pa 'dam du sbam pa'i tshul du bsdus nas rim pa dgur phye ste /
translated: First, desire realm attachment, anger, pride, and ignorance are combined in the manner of a swamp and divided into nine levels:

original: chen po'i chen po dang / chen po'i 'bring dang / chen po'i chung ngu dang / 'bring po'i chen po dang / 'bring po'i 'bring po dang / 'bring po'i chung ngu dang / chung ngu'i chen po dang / chung ngu'i 'bring dang / chung ngu'i chung du'o //
analyzed: chen po'i chen po dang / chen po'i 'bring dang / chen po'i chung ngu dang / 'bring po'i chen po dang / 'bring po'i 'bring po dang / 'bring po'i chung ngu dang / chung ngu'i chen po dang / chung ngu'i 'bring dang / chung ngu'i chung du'o //
translated: great-great, great-medium, great-small, medium-great, medium-medium, medium-small, small-great, small-medium, and small-small.

original: de dag gi gnyen po bar chad med pa'i lam dang / rnam par grol ba'i lam yang de bzhin du rim pa dgu dgur rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de dag gi gnyen po bar chad med pa'i lam dang / rnam par grol ba'i lam yang de bzhin du rim pa dgu dgur rig par bya'o //
translated: The uninterrupted path and the path of liberation that are their antidotes should be understood as having nine levels in the same order.

original: de la nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa chen po'i chen po'i gnyen po bar chad med pa'i lam dang / rnam par grol ba'i lam gyi rnam pa chung ngu'i chung ngu ste /
analyzed: de la nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa chen po'i chen po'i gnyen po bar chad med pa'i lam dang / rnam par grol ba'i lam gyi rnam pa chung ngu'i chung ngu ste /
translated: The antidote to the great of the great aspect of the afflictions is the uninterrupted path, and the small of the small aspect of the liberated path.

original: de bzhin du nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa chung ngu'i chung ngu'i gnyen par ni lam chen po'i chen po'i bar du'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa chung ngu'i chung ngu'i gnyen par ni lam chen po'i chen po'i bar du'o //
translated: Similarly, the antidote to the small of the small aspect of the afflictions is the great of the great path.

original: de la 'dod pa'i khams kyi bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa dgu la rnam pa drug spangs nas /
analyzed: de la 'dod pa'i khams kyi bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa dgu la rnam pa drug spangs nas /
translated: Having abandoned six aspects of the afflictions of the desire realm that are objects to be abandoned by the path of meditation,

original: lan cig phyir 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: one becomes a once returner.

original: dgu pa spangs na phyir mi 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dgu pa spangs na phyir mi 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Having abandoned the ninth, one becomes a nonreturner.

original: gzugs dang gzugs med par gtogs pa'i bar chad med pa'i lam dang / rnam par grol ba'i lam ni gzugs kyi khams na bsam gtan bzhi dang gzugs med pa bzhi ste /
analyzed: gzugs dang gzugs med par gtogs pa'i bar chad med pa'i lam dang / rnam par grol ba'i lam ni gzugs kyi khams na bsam gtan bzhi dang gzugs med pa bzhi ste /
translated: The uninterrupted and liberated paths belonging to the form and formless realms are the four absorptions and four formless states.

original: spyir sa brgyad yod pa'i sa re re la yang srid pa'i 'dod chags dang / nga rgyal dang ma rig pa sad ma bzhin du rnam pa dgu dgur phye ste /
analyzed: spyir sa brgyad yod pa'i sa re re la yang srid pa'i 'dod chags dang / nga rgyal dang ma rig pa sad ma bzhin du rnam pa dgu dgur phye ste /
translated: In general, there are eight stages, and each stage is divided into nine degrees, from the highest of the high to the smallest of the small, in terms of the passions of desire, pride, and ignorance, as if they were sleeping.

original: de dag gi gnyen po bar chad med pa'i lam dang / rnam par @68b grol ba'i lam yang rnam pa dgu dgur khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: de dag gi gnyen po bar chad med pa'i lam dang / rnam par @68b grol ba'i lam yang rnam pa dgu dgur khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: One should understand that there are nine degrees of the path of no obstacles and nine degrees of the path of liberation, which are the antidotes to these.

original: de ltar nyon mongs pa rnams mthar gyis spangs par gnas te /
analyzed: de ltar nyon mongs pa rnams mthar gyis spangs par gnas te /
translated: Thus, the passions are eliminated gradually.

original: srid pa'i rtse mo'i nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa chung ngu'i chung du spangs nas dgra bcom par 'gyur te /
analyzed: srid pa'i rtse mo'i nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa chung ngu'i chung du spangs nas dgra bcom par 'gyur te /
translated: When the smallest of the small degree of the passions of the peak of existence is eliminated, one becomes an arhat.

original: de ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang / gnyen po'i rab tu dbye ba rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang / gnyen po'i rab tu dbye ba rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
translated: This is the presentation of the divisions of the unfavorable and its antidote.

original: de la yid la byed pa'i rab tu dbye ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la yid la byed pa'i rab tu dbye ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the division of mental orientations?

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag la brtsams nas dgra bcom pa nyid thob kyi bar du yid la byed pa bdun rim gyis 'byung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag la brtsams nas dgra bcom pa nyid thob kyi bar du yid la byed pa bdun rim gyis 'byung bar 'gyur te /
translated: From the beginning of the four noble truths until the attainment of arhatship, seven mental orientations occur in sequence.

original: bdun gang zhe na /
analyzed: bdun gang zhe na /
translated: What are the seven?

original: mtshan nyid so sor rig pa'i yid la byed pa dang / mos pa las byung ba'i yid la byed pa dang / rab tu dben pa'i yid la byed pa dang / spyod pa'i yid la byed pa dang / dga' ba sdud pa'i yid la byed pa dang /
analyzed: mtshan nyid so sor rig pa'i yid la byed pa dang / mos pa las byung ba'i yid la byed pa dang / rab tu dben pa'i yid la byed pa dang / spyod pa'i yid la byed pa dang / dga' ba sdud pa'i yid la byed pa dang /
translated: The attention of discernment of the characteristics, the attention arisen from belief, the attention of isolation, the attention of analysis, the attention of delight and satisfaction,

original: sbyor ba mthar thug pa'i yid la byed pa dang / sbyor ba mthar thug pa'i 'bras bu yid la byed pa'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba mthar thug pa'i yid la byed pa dang / sbyor ba mthar thug pa'i 'bras bu yid la byed pa'o //
translated: the attention of the culmination of application, and the attention of the result of the culmination of application.

original: de la mtshan nyid so sor rig pa'i yid la byed pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la mtshan nyid so sor rig pa'i yid la byed pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the attention of discernment of the characteristics?

original: dang po'i rnam pa'i rab tu dbye bas bden pa bzhi po dag gi mtshan nyid rnam pa bzhi bzhis so sor rig par byed pa'i yid la byed pa yin no //
analyzed: dang po'i rnam pa'i rab tu dbye bas bden pa bzhi po dag gi mtshan nyid rnam pa bzhi bzhis so sor rig par byed pa'i yid la byed pa yin no //
translated: It is the attention which discerns the four characteristics of the four truths by means of the first category of aspects.

original: mos pa las byung ba'i yid la byed pa gang zhe na ;
analyzed: mos pa las byung ba'i yid la byed pa gang zhe na ;
translated: What is the attention arisen from belief?

original: de ltar mtshan nyid so sor rig pa'i yid la byed pa thob pa yan chad nas 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi mchog gi rab tu dbye ba bden pa bzhi po dag la thos pa dang bsam pa las byung ba'i yid la byed pa dang / ma 'dres par gcig tu bsgom pa'i rnam pas mos pa byed pa'i yid la byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar mtshan nyid so sor rig pa'i yid la byed pa thob pa yan chad nas 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi mchog gi rab tu dbye ba bden pa bzhi po dag la thos pa dang bsam pa las byung ba'i yid la byed pa dang / ma 'dres par gcig tu bsgom pa'i rnam pas mos pa byed pa'i yid la byed pa yin no //
translated: Thus, from the attainment of the mental attention of the discernment of the characteristics up to the supreme mundane factors, the mental attention is that which is produced from hearing and reflection with regard to the four truths, and it is the mental attention of conviction by way of the aspect of the cultivation of the unmixed single path.

original: rab tu dben pa'i yid la byed pa gang zhe na /üîΩmngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa'i rab tu dbye ba'i bzod pa brgyad dang / shes pa brgyad kyis bden pa bzhi mngon par rtogs nas mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams spangs te /
analyzed: rab tu dben pa'i yid la byed pa gang zhe na / mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa'i rab tu dbye ba'i bzod pa brgyad dang / shes pa brgyad kyis bden pa bzhi mngon par rtogs nas mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams spangs te /
translated: What is mental attention to isolation?

original: rgyun tu zhugs pa'i sa thob pa'i yid la byed pa yin no //
analyzed: rgyun tu zhugs pa'i sa thob pa'i yid la byed pa yin no //
translated: It is the mental attention of the attainment of the stage of the stream-winner, after the direct realization of the four noble truths by means of the eight knowledges and the eight forbearances of the discernment of direct realization and inferential realization, and after the abandonment of the defilements to be abandoned by seeing.

original: dpyod pa'i yid la byed pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: dpyod pa'i yid la byed pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is mental attention to scrutiny?

original: bsgom pa'i lam thams cad la nyon mongs pa spangs pa dang / ma spangs pa la so sor brtags shing dpyad nas lam ji ltar thob pa goms par byed pa'i yid la byed pa yin no //
analyzed: bsgom pa'i lam thams cad la nyon mongs pa spangs pa dang / ma spangs pa la so sor brtags shing dpyad nas lam ji ltar thob pa goms par byed pa'i yid la byed pa yin no //
translated: It is the mental attention that, in all the paths of cultivation, examines and analyzes the abandonment and non-abandonment of the defilements, and that cultivates the path as it has been attained.

original: @69a * // dga' ba sdud pa'i yid la byed pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: @69a * // dga' ba sdud pa'i yid la byed pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is mental attention that produces satisfaction?

original: dpyod pa'i yid la byed pa de nyid kyi gnas skabs na lam ji ltar thob pa goms par byas nas de'i 'og tu dus dus su kun du skyo bar 'gyur ba'i chos rnams la sems skyo bar byed pa dang / dus dus su mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ba'i chos rnams la sems mngon par dga' bar byed pa'i yid la byed pa yin no //
analyzed: dpyod pa'i yid la byed pa de nyid kyi gnas skabs na lam ji ltar thob pa goms par byas nas de'i 'og tu dus dus su kun du skyo bar 'gyur ba'i chos rnams la sems skyo bar byed pa dang / dus dus su mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ba'i chos rnams la sems mngon par dga' bar byed pa'i yid la byed pa yin no //
translated: It is the mental attention that, in the state of the mental attention of examination, cultivates the path as it has been attained, and that, after that, from time to time gladdens the mind with regard to the teachings that are the cause of satisfaction, and from time to time arouses disgust with regard to the teachings that are the cause of disgust.

original: sbyor ba mthar thug pa'i yid la byed pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: sbyor ba mthar thug pa'i yid la byed pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is mental attention that is applied and sustained?

original: de ltar dga' ba sdud pa'i yid la byed pa de kun du brten zhing goms par byas //
analyzed: de ltar dga' ba sdud pa'i yid la byed pa de kun du brten zhing goms par byas //
translated: It is the mental attention that, having thus cultivated the mental attention that produces satisfaction, is applied and sustained in the object of concentration.

original: lan mang du byas pa'i rgyus bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa ma lus par spang bar bya ba'i phyir thams cad kyi tha mar slob pa'i rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin skyes par 'gyur pa'i yid la byed pa yin no //
analyzed: lan mang du byas pa'i rgyus bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa ma lus par spang bar bya ba'i phyir thams cad kyi tha mar slob pa'i rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin skyes par 'gyur pa'i yid la byed pa yin no //
translated: The attention that is the result of the culmination of application is the attention that is the result of the vajra-like samadhi, which is the final stage of the path of meditation, and which is the cause for the complete abandonment of all the afflictions that are to be abandoned by the path of meditation.

original: sbyor ba mthar thug pa'i 'bras bu yid la byed pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: sbyor ba mthar thug pa'i 'bras bu yid la byed pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is attention that is the result of the culmination of application?

original: rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin skyes ma thag tu nyon mongs pa'i phyogs su gyur pa gnas ngan len gyi sa bon thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir sems shin tu rnam par grol ba dang / rigs yongs su dag pa thob pa dang /
analyzed: rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin skyes ma thag tu nyon mongs pa'i phyogs su gyur pa gnas ngan len gyi sa bon thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir sems shin tu rnam par grol ba dang / rigs yongs su dag pa thob pa dang /
translated: It is the attention that is the result of the vajra-like samadhi, which is the cause for the complete abandonment of all the seeds of the negative tendencies that are on the side of the afflictions, and which is the cause for the attainment of the complete liberation of the mind and the attainment of the complete purification of the lineage.

original: zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa skyes pa'i sgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'i yid la byed pa yin te /
analyzed: zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa skyes pa'i sgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'i yid la byed pa yin te /
translated: It is the attention that is the cause for the attainment of the state of the destruction of all the defilements and the knowledge of their non-production.

original: de ni yid la byed pa'i rab tu dbye ba rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni yid la byed pa'i rab tu dbye ba rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
translated: This is the presentation of the classification of attention.

original: de la mngon par rtogs pa'i rab tu dbye ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la mngon par rtogs pa'i rab tu dbye ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the classification of clear knowledge?

original: bden pa mngon par rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang / rnam par bstan pa ste /
analyzed: bden pa mngon par rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang / rnam par bstan pa ste /
translated: It is the definition and the teaching of the clear knowledge of the truths.

original: de la bden pa mngon par rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la bden pa mngon par rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid gang zhe na /
translated: What is the definition of the clear knowledge of the truths?

original: rnam par grol ba'i lam gyis bsdus pa'i shes pa rnams dang / mthong ba'i lam gyi gnas skabs na bden pa rnams la nges pa'i shes rab lhan cig 'byung ba dang rgyu dang bcas pa dang / de ni re zhig mtshan nyid yin no //
analyzed: rnam par grol ba'i lam gyis bsdus pa'i shes pa rnams dang / mthong ba'i lam gyi gnas skabs na bden pa rnams la nges pa'i shes rab lhan cig 'byung ba dang rgyu dang bcas pa dang / de ni re zhig mtshan nyid yin no //
translated: It is the knowledge included in the path of liberation, the wisdom of certainty with regard to the truths, which occurs in the state of the path of insight, together with its associates and its causes. This is the definition.

original: bden pa mngon par rtogs pa la rnam par du yod ce na /
analyzed: bden pa mngon par rtogs pa la rnam par du yod ce na /
translated: How many kinds of clear knowledge of the truths are there?

original: rnam par drug ste /
analyzed: rnam par drug ste /
translated: There are six kinds:

original: bsam pa mngon par rtogs pa dang / dad pa mngon par rtogs pa dang / tshul khrims mngon par rtogs pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa'i shes pa bden pa mngon par rtogs pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa'i mtha' las byung ba'i bden pa mngon par rtogs pa dang /üîΩmthar thug pa'i mngon par rtogs pa'o //üîΩde la bsam @69b ba mngon par rtogs pa gang zhe na /üîΩbden pa rnams la nges par sems pa bsam pa las byung ba'i shes rab chen po'i ngo bo nyid dang / de dang ldan pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid yin no //
analyzed: bsam pa mngon par rtogs pa dang / dad pa mngon par rtogs pa dang / tshul khrims mngon par rtogs pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa'i shes pa bden pa mngon par rtogs pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa'i mtha' las byung ba'i bden pa mngon par rtogs pa dang / mthar thug pa'i mngon par rtogs pa'o // de la bsam @69b ba mngon par rtogs pa gang zhe na / bden pa rnams la nges par sems pa bsam pa las byung ba'i shes rab chen po'i ngo bo nyid dang / de dang ldan pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid yin no //
translated: realization of the will, realization of faith, realization of morality, realization of the knowledge of realization, realization of the truth that arises from the end of realization,üîΩand ultimate realization.üîΩüîΩWhat is realization of the will?üîΩIt is the essence of great wisdom born of reflection on the Truths, and it is the essence of the factors of wisdom associated with enlightenment.üîΩ

original: 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dad pa chen po thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab nges pa dkon mchog la dmigs pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / de dang ldan pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dad pa chen po thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab nges pa dkon mchog la dmigs pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / de dang ldan pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid yin no //
translated: It is the great mundane and supramundane faith, the essence of the wisdom born of hearing, the essence of the focus on the Three Jewels, and the essence of the factors of enlightenment and the factors that are conducive to enlightenment.

original: tshul khrims mngon par rtogs par gang zhe na /
analyzed: tshul khrims mngon par rtogs par gang zhe na /
translated: What is the realization of morality?

original: ngan song ba'i las mi byed cing nges par sdom pa thob pa 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims kyi ngo bo nyid dang / de dang ldan pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid yin no //
analyzed: ngan song ba'i las mi byed cing nges par sdom pa thob pa 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims kyi ngo bo nyid dang / de dang ldan pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid yin no //
translated: It is the essence of the morality pleasing to the Aryas, the essence of the morality which is obtained through the vow of restraint, and the essence of the factors of enlightenment and the factors that are conducive to enlightenment.

original: mngon par rtogs pa'i shes pa bden pa mngon par rtogs par gang zhe na /
analyzed: mngon par rtogs pa'i shes pa bden pa mngon par rtogs par gang zhe na /
translated: What is the knowledge of realization of the truths?

original: rnam par ma bzhag pa'i bden pa la dmigs pa'i shes rab kyi ngo bo nyid dang / de dang ldan pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid yin te /
analyzed: rnam par ma bzhag pa'i bden pa la dmigs pa'i shes rab kyi ngo bo nyid dang / de dang ldan pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid yin te /
translated: It is the nature of wisdom that focuses on the truth that is not yet ascertained and it is the nature of the factors that are conducive to enlightenment that possess that wisdom.

original: de ni sngon sbyor ba'i lam la tshogs shin tu bsags pa'i tshe sems yongs su sbyangs pa legs par byas pa na /
analyzed: de ni sngon sbyor ba'i lam la tshogs shin tu bsags pa'i tshe sems yongs su sbyangs pa legs par byas pa na /
translated: When one has accumulated the accumulations on the path of preparation, one has properly refined the mind.

original: 'jig rten pa'i nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mthar thug pa'i rjes la so so'i bdag nyid la sems can gyi brda bstsal ba'i chos la dmigs shing mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa'i gnas ngan len
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mthar thug pa'i rjes la so so'i bdag nyid la sems can gyi brda bstsal ba'i chos la dmigs shing mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa'i gnas ngan len
translated: After the final roots of virtue that are conducive to penetrative insight in the mundane sphere, one focuses on the phenomena that are the signs of sentient beings in one's own mind and one abandons the negative tendencies that are associated with the mental afflictions that are to be abandoned by means of the path of seeing.

original: chung ngu dang bral ba'i sems dang po skye ba dang / de'i rjes la so so'i bdag nyid la chos kyi brda bstsal ba'i chos la dmigs shing mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa'i gnas ngan len 'bring dang bral ba'i sems gnyis pa skye ba dang /
analyzed: chung ngu dang bral ba'i sems dang po skye ba dang / de'i rjes la so so'i bdag nyid la chos kyi brda bstsal ba'i chos la dmigs shing mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa'i gnas ngan len 'bring dang bral ba'i sems gnyis pa skye ba dang /
translated: the second generation of the mind free from medium seeds and

original: de'i rjes la sems can thams cad chos thams cad kyi brda bstsal ba'i chos la dmigs shing mthong bas spangs bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa'i gnas ngan len thams cad dang bral ba'i sems gsum pa skye ba gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: de'i rjes la sems can thams cad chos thams cad kyi brda bstsal ba'i chos la dmigs shing mthong bas spangs bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa'i gnas ngan len thams cad dang bral ba'i sems gsum pa skye ba gang yin pa ste /
translated: the third generation of the mind free from all seeds.

original: sems gsum po de dag las dang po gnyis ni chos shes pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa yin la /
analyzed: sems gsum po de dag las dang po gnyis ni chos shes pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa yin la /
translated: The first two of these three minds are concomitant with Dharma knowledge,

original: tha ma gsum pa gcig pu ni rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa dang mtshungs par @70a * //üîΩldan pa yin te /
analyzed: tha ma gsum pa gcig pu ni rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa dang mtshungs par @70a * //üîΩldan pa yin te /
translated: but the third alone is concomitant with subsequent knowledge.

original: de dag kyang zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong zung du 'brel bas 'jug pa'i lam yin no //
analyzed: de dag kyang zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong zung du 'brel bas 'jug pa'i lam yin no //
translated: Moreover, they are the path of entry through the union of serenity and insight.

original: de ltar zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong gi phyogs dang mthun pa'i sems gsum po de dag gis mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa nye bar zhi ba mngon du byed pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang phung po thams cad zhi bar byed pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam thob pa gang yin pa de ni mngon par rtogs pa'i shes par bden pa mthong bar rtogs pa zhes bya'o /
analyzed: de ltar zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong gi phyogs dang mthun pa'i sems gsum po de dag gis mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa nye bar zhi ba mngon du byed pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang phung po thams cad zhi bar byed pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam thob pa gang yin pa de ni mngon par rtogs pa'i shes par bden pa mthong bar rtogs pa zhes bya'o /
translated: Thus, the three mental states that are conducive to serenity and insight manifest the pacification of the mental afflictions that are to be abandoned by seeing. The attainment of the supramundane path that pacifies all the mental afflictions and the aggregates is called ‚Äúthe knowledge that realizes the clear knowledge of the truths that arises from the culmination of clear realization.‚Äù

original: mngon par rtogs pa'i mtha' las byung ba'i shes pa bden pa mngon par rtogs pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: mngon par rtogs pa'i mtha' las byung ba'i shes pa bden pa mngon par rtogs pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the knowledge that realizes the truths that arises from the culmination of clear realization?

original: rnam par gzhag pa la bden pa'i dmigs pa'i shes rab kyi ngo bo nyid dang / de dang ldan pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid yin te /
analyzed: rnam par gzhag pa la bden pa'i dmigs pa'i shes rab kyi ngo bo nyid dang / de dang ldan pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid yin te /
translated: It is the clear knowledge of the truths that has the nature of wisdom that takes the truths as its object and that has the nature of the spiritual qualities that are conducive to enlightenment.

original: de yang sems gsum pa'i mjug thogs su mthong ba'i lam las langs pas mngon du byas nas nga sngon 'jig rten pa'i shes pas dpyad nas rnam par gzhag pa'i bden pas 'og ma pa sa 'og ma'i dbang gis byung ba dang / sa 'og ma pa sa gong ma'i dbang gis byung ba rnams la chos shes pa dang /
analyzed: de yang sems gsum pa'i mjug thogs su mthong ba'i lam las langs pas mngon du byas nas nga sngon 'jig rten pa'i shes pas dpyad nas rnam par gzhag pa'i bden pas 'og ma pa sa 'og ma'i dbang gis byung ba dang / sa 'og ma pa sa gong ma'i dbang gis byung ba rnams la chos shes pa dang /
translated: Also, having arisen from the path of seeing that is the conclusion of the third mental state, it manifests and then the conventional knowledge that is similar to the Dharma knowledge and subsequent knowledge of the desire realm that is established by the knowledge of lower and higher levels and the knowledge of lower and higher levels that is established by the knowledge of the desire realm arises.

original: rjes su rtogs pa'i shas pa dang 'dra ba kun rdzob shes pa dang / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rjes la thob pa'i shes pas bden pa re re la yang go rims bzhin du 'dod pa'i shes pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa nges pa'i shes pa gnyis gnyis byung ste /
analyzed: rjes su rtogs pa'i shas pa dang 'dra ba kun rdzob shes pa dang / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rjes la thob pa'i shes pas bden pa re re la yang go rims bzhin du 'dod pa'i shes pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa nges pa'i shes pa gnyis gnyis byung ste /
translated: Conventional knowledge, knowledge of the desire realm, knowledge of definite understanding and subsequent knowledge arise in order with respect to each truth.

original: de ltar mngon par rtogs pa'i snga ma las langs pa las gong ma 'am gong ma'i bden pa dag la shes pa gnyis gnyis 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni mngon par rtogs pa'i rjes las thob pa'i shes pa yin pas na /
analyzed: de ltar mngon par rtogs pa'i snga ma las langs pa las gong ma 'am gong ma'i bden pa dag la shes pa gnyis gnyis 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni mngon par rtogs pa'i rjes las thob pa'i shes pa yin pas na /
translated: Thus, the two knowledges that arise from the former realization with regard to the higher or higher truths are the knowledge subsequent to realization.

original: de'i phyir mngon par rtogs pa'i mtha' las byung ba'i shes pa bden pa mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya'o //üîΩde la shes pa snga ma ni brda bstsal ba'i chos la dmigs pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa med pa dang / rnam par ma bzhag pa'i bden pa la dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir mngon par rtogs pa'i mtha' las byung ba'i shes pa bden pa mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya'o // de la shes pa snga ma ni brda bstsal ba'i chos la dmigs pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa med pa dang / rnam par ma bzhag pa'i bden pa la dmigs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is called the knowledge realizing the truths that arises from the end of realization.üîΩThe former knowledge is non-conceptual and focuses on the truth that is not established because it focuses on the Dharma that is not yet taught.

original: shes pa phyi ma ni brda ma bstsal ba'i chos la dmigs pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa dang / rnam par bzhag pa'i bden pa dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: shes pa phyi ma ni brda ma bstsal ba'i chos la dmigs pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa dang / rnam par bzhag pa'i bden pa dmigs pa yin no //
translated: The latter knowledge is conceptual and focuses on the truth that is established because it focuses on the Dharma that has been taught.

original: yang snga mas ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa'i bag la nyal @70b gnas pa spong bar byed do //
analyzed: yang snga mas ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa'i bag la nyal @70b gnas pa spong bar byed do //
translated: Moreover, the former eliminates the latent impressions of the defilements to be eliminated by the path of vision.

original: phyi mas ni dmigs pa yid la byed pas de dag nyid kyis 'jug pa spong bar byed do //
analyzed: phyi mas ni dmigs pa yid la byed pas de dag nyid kyis 'jug pa spong bar byed do //
translated: The latter eliminates the engagement of those very latent impressions by means of attention to the objective support.

original: yang snga mas ni bsgom pa'i lam la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyis spong bar byed do //
analyzed: yang snga mas ni bsgom pa'i lam la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyis spong bar byed do //
translated: Moreover, the former eliminates by means of the supramundane path on the path of meditative development.

original: phyi mas ni 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyis spong bar byed do //
analyzed: phyi mas ni 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyis spong bar byed do //
translated: The latter eliminates by means of the mundane and supramundane paths.

original: mthar thug pa'i mngon par rtogs pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: mthar thug pa'i mngon par rtogs pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the final clear realization?

original: zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa'i ngo bo nyid dang de dang ldan pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs dang / mthun pa'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid yin te /
analyzed: zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa'i ngo bo nyid dang de dang ldan pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs dang / mthun pa'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid yin te /
translated: It is the nature of the knowledge of destruction and of non-origination, and it is the nature of the factors of enlightenment and of the dharmas that accompany enlightenment.

original: de yang bsgom pas spang bar bya dag spangs pa la zad pa shes pa dang mi skye ba'i shes pa gcig tu 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshe 'di la nyon mongs pa thams cad nges par spangs pa dang /
analyzed: de yang bsgom pas spang bar bya dag spangs pa la zad pa shes pa dang mi skye ba'i shes pa gcig tu 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshe 'di la nyon mongs pa thams cad nges par spangs pa dang /
translated: The knowledge of elimination and the knowledge of nonarising are one in the mundane and supramundane definite abandonment of all afflictions in this life and in the definite cessation of all the aggregates in the future.

original: phyi ma la yang phung po thams cad nges par 'gags pas na de'i phyir mthar thug pa'i mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: phyi ma la yang phung po thams cad nges par 'gags pas na de'i phyir mthar thug pa'i mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore it is called ultimate realization.

original: de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i zad pa zhes pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i zad pa zhes pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is supramundane knowledge of elimination?

original: zad pa la rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: zad pa la rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is nonconceptual knowledge of elimination.

original: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i zad pa shes pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i zad pa shes pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is mundane and supramundane knowledge of elimination?

original: zad pa la rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i shes pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: zad pa la rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i shes pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is conceptual knowledge of elimination.

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mi skye bshes pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mi skye bshes pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is supramundane knowledge of nonarising?

original: phung po 'gags pa de nyid kyi rgyu'i don gyis phyi mar phung po mi skye ba las rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: phung po 'gags pa de nyid kyi rgyu'i don gyis phyi mar phung po mi skye ba las rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the non-conceptual knowledge of the non-arising of the aggregates in the future, by the meaning of cause of the cessation of the aggregates.

original: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mi skye ba shes pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mi skye ba shes pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the mundane and supramundane knowledge of non-arising?

original: phyi mar phung po mi skye ba la rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i shes pa gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: phyi mar phung po mi skye ba la rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i shes pa gang yin pa ste /
translated: It is the conceptual knowledge of the non-arising of the aggregates in the future.

original: de ni mngon par rtogs pa'i rab tu dbye ba rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni mngon par rtogs pa'i rab tu dbye ba rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
translated: This is the establishment of the classification of clear knowledge.

original: de la 'bras bu thob pa'i rab tu dbye ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'bras bu thob pa'i rab tu dbye ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the classification of the attainment of the fruits?

original: bden pa bzhi mngon par rtogs pa'i 'bras bu 'phags pa'i gang zag brgyad rnam par gzhag pa ste /
analyzed: bden pa bzhi mngon par rtogs pa'i 'bras bu 'phags pa'i gang zag brgyad rnam par gzhag pa ste /
translated: It is the establishment of the eight kinds of noble persons who have attained the fruits of the clear knowledge of the four noble truths.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang /
translated: 5. the one who has entered into the realization of the fruit of the non-returner,üîΩ6. the non-returner,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu mngon sum @71a * //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu mngon sum @71a * //
translated: 7. the one who has entered into the realization of the fruit of the saint,

original: du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang / dgra bcom pa'o //
analyzed: du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang / dgra bcom pa'o //
translated: 8. the saint.

original: de la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa gang zhe na /
translated: 1. What is the one who has entered into the realization of the fruit of the stream-winner?

original: mthong ba'i lam gyis skad cig ma bco lnga mngon par rtogs pa ste /
analyzed: mthong ba'i lam gyis skad cig ma bco lnga mngon par rtogs pa ste /
translated: It is the one who has realized the fifteen moments of the path of vision.

original: de yan chad 'phags pa'i gang zag ces bya'o //
analyzed: de yan chad 'phags pa'i gang zag ces bya'o //
translated: From that moment on, he is called an Aryan.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa gang zhe na /
translated: 2. What is the stream-winner?

original: bsgom pa'i lam du gtogs pa lam la rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa zhes bya ba skad cig ma bcu drug pa mngon par rtogs pa ste /
analyzed: bsgom pa'i lam du gtogs pa lam la rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa zhes bya ba skad cig ma bcu drug pa mngon par rtogs pa ste /
translated: The sixteenth moment of the path of seeing is called subsequent knowledge of the truth of the path.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyun gyi lam du zhugs pas rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyun gyi lam du zhugs pas rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called the path of seeing because it is the first entry to the path that is the cause of nirvana.

original: de ni rnam pa gnyis te /üîΩde ltar thogs na srid pa lan bdun pa dang / rigs nas rigs su skye ba'o //üîΩde la re zhig thogs na srid pa lan bdun pa zhes bya ba ni mi rnams kyi nang du de las gzhan pa'i srid pa bdun pa dang / srid pa'i bar ma bdun dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du yang de las gzhan pa'i srid pa bdun dang /
analyzed: de ni rnam pa gnyis te / de ltar thogs na srid pa lan bdun pa dang / rigs nas rigs su skye ba'o // de la re zhig thogs na srid pa lan bdun pa zhes bya ba ni mi rnams kyi nang du de las gzhan pa'i srid pa bdun pa dang / srid pa'i bar ma bdun dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du yang de las gzhan pa'i srid pa bdun dang /
translated: It is of two types:üîΩone who is obstructed from seven existences and one who is obstructed from being born in any of the six types of existence.üîΩOne who is obstructed from seven existences is one who is obstructed from seven existences in the desire realm, seven intermediate existences, seven existences in the desire realm, and seven intermediate existences in the desire realm.

original: srid pa bar ma bdun nyid mtshams sbyor bar byed de /
analyzed: srid pa bar ma bdun nyid mtshams sbyor bar byed de /
translated: One who is obstructed from being born in any of the six types of existence is one who is obstructed from seven existences in the desire realm, seven intermediate existences, seven existences in the desire realm, seven intermediate existences in the desire realm, and seven existences in the form realm, seven intermediate existences in the form realm, and seven existences in the formless realm.

original: de ltar srid pa nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi bar du nying mtshams sbyar nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ngang tshul can gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar srid pa nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi bar du nying mtshams sbyar nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ngang tshul can gang yin pa'o //
translated: Thus, he is one who, after linking with existence up to twenty-eight times, is of the nature to attain complete nirvana.

original: de yang thams cad ni de ltar ma yin pas re ltar thogs na zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de yang thams cad ni de ltar ma yin pas re ltar thogs na zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: And since this is not the case for all, he says, ‚Äúat the very most.‚Äù

original: thams cad kyi tha shal ba dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: thams cad kyi tha shal ba dang sbyar ro //
translated: This refers to the very worst of all.

original: rigs nas rigs su skye ba zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: rigs nas rigs su skye ba zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: ‚Äú Reborn in the same class‚Äù is twofold:

original: lha'i rigs nas rigs su skye ba dang / mi'i rigs nas rigs su skye ba'o //
analyzed: lha'i rigs nas rigs su skye ba dang / mi'i rigs nas rigs su skye ba'o //
translated: reborn in the same class of gods and reborn in the same class of humans.

original: de la lha'i rigs nas rigs su skye ba ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye ba gnyis sam gsum du 'khor nas lha'i rigs de nyid dam gzhan du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: de la lha'i rigs nas rigs su skye ba ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye ba gnyis sam gsum du 'khor nas lha'i rigs de nyid dam gzhan du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba gang yin pa'o //
translated: Among these, being reborn in the same class of gods is when one who has been born among the gods in the desire realm cycles for two or three births and then attains complete nirvana in that very class of gods or another.

original: mi'i rigs nas rigs su skye ba ni mi rnams kyi nang du skye ba gnyis sam gsum du 'khor nas gling de nyid dam gzhan du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: mi'i rigs nas rigs su skye ba ni mi rnams kyi nang du skye ba gnyis sam gsum du 'khor nas gling de nyid dam gzhan du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba gang yin pa'o //
translated: The once-returner is the person who, having transmigrated among humans, after two or three births in the same realm or in another realm, will obtain Nirvana.

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the candidate for the fruit of the once-returner?

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gnas pa de nyid kyis 'dod pa'i khams kyi bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa rnam pa dgu las rnam pa gcig nas rnam pa lnga'i bar du spangs pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gnas pa de nyid kyis 'dod pa'i khams kyi bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa rnam pa dgu las rnam pa gcig nas rnam pa lnga'i bar du spangs pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the same as the candidate for the fruit of the stream-winner, with this difference, that he has abandoned from one to five categories of defilements of the realm of desire which are to be abandoned by cultivation.

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the once-returner?

original: @71b zhugs pa de nyid kyis 'dod pa'i khams kyi bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa rnam pa drug spangs pa ste /
analyzed: @71b zhugs pa de nyid kyis 'dod pa'i khams kyi bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa rnam pa drug spangs pa ste /
translated: It is the same as the candidate for the fruit of the once-returner, with this difference, that he has abandoned the sixth category of defilements of the realm of desire which are to be abandoned by cultivation.

original: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du song nas mi'i 'jig rten du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du song nas mi'i 'jig rten du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong ba zhes bya'o //
translated: Having gone among the gods of the realm of desire, he returns once to the human world.

original: de ni bar chad gcig pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: de ni bar chad gcig pa zhes bya ste /
translated: He is called a ‚Äúonce-returner‚Äù because he returns once.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa la tshe gcig gis chod pa'i phyir dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa gcig gis chod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa la tshe gcig gis chod pa'i phyir dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa gcig gis chod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: He is called a ‚Äúsingle-intervaler‚Äù because he is separated from nirvana by a single interval, and because he is separated from the fruit of non-return by a single class of defilements.

original: de yang rgyu gsum gyis na bar chad gcig pa yin te /
analyzed: de yang rgyu gsum gyis na bar chad gcig pa yin te /
translated: He is a single-intervaler for three reasons:

original: 'dod pa'i khams kyi bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa bdun nam brgyad spangs pa'i phyir dang / de'i gnyen po zag pa med pa'i dbang po thob pa'i phyir dang / tshe gcig lus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams kyi bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa bdun nam brgyad spangs pa'i phyir dang / de'i gnyen po zag pa med pa'i dbang po thob pa'i phyir dang / tshe gcig lus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because he has abandoned seven or eight categories of defilements of the realm of desire which should be abandoned by cultivation; because he has obtained the pure faculties which are the counter-agent to these defilements; and because he has only one birth remaining.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the person who is in the path of cultivation with the fruit of non-return?

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gnas pa de nyid kyis 'dod pa'i khams kyi bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa rnam pa bdun nam brgyad spangs pa gang yin pa de nyid yin no //
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gnas pa de nyid kyis 'dod pa'i khams kyi bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa rnam pa bdun nam brgyad spangs pa gang yin pa de nyid yin no //
translated: It is the same as the state of the once-returner, except that the seven or eight categories of defilements of the realm of desire which should be abandoned by cultivation have been abandoned.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is a non-returner?

original: zhugs pa de nyid kyi 'dod pa'i khams kyi bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa dgu spangs pa ste /
analyzed: zhugs pa de nyid kyi 'dod pa'i khams kyi bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa dgu spangs pa ste /
translated: It is the same as the state of the once-returner, except that the nine categories of defilements of the realm of desire which should be abandoned by cultivation have been abandoned.

original: 'dod pa'i khams su phyir mi 'ong bas phyir mi 'ong ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams su phyir mi 'ong bas phyir mi 'ong ba zhes bya'o //
translated: He is called a non-returner because he will not return to the realm of desire.

original: de ni rnam pa gsum ste /
analyzed: de ni rnam pa gsum ste /
translated: He is of three kinds:

original: gzugs su nye bar 'gro ba dang / gzugs med par nye bar 'gro ba dang / tshe 'di la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'o //
analyzed: gzugs su nye bar 'gro ba dang / gzugs med par nye bar 'gro ba dang / tshe 'di la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'o //
translated: one who goes upstream, one who goes to the formless realm and one who attains nirvana in this very life.

original: de la gzugs su nye bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba gzugs kyi khams su skye ba'i rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'o //
analyzed: de la gzugs su nye bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba gzugs kyi khams su skye ba'i rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'o //
translated: One who goes upstream is one who, being detached from the realm of desire, attains nirvana gradually, being reborn in the realm of form.

original: de ni rnam pa lnga ste /
analyzed: de ni rnam pa lnga ste /
translated: There are five types:

original: bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / skyes nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /üîΩgong du 'pho ba'o //üîΩde la bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / skyes nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / gong du 'pho ba'o // de la bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba zhes bya ba ni /
translated: those who attain nirvana in the intermediate state, those who attain nirvana after birth, those who attain nirvana with effort, those who attain nirvana without effort, and those who go upstream.

original: gzugs kyi khams kyi lha'i rigs gang yang rung ba nas shi 'phos nas gzugs kyi khams kyi lha'i ris gang yang rung ba'i bar ma do'i skye @72a * //üîΩba'i srid pa la gnas pa ste /
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams kyi lha'i rigs gang yang rung ba nas shi 'phos nas gzugs kyi khams kyi lha'i ris gang yang rung ba'i bar ma do'i skye @72a * // ba'i srid pa la gnas pa ste /
translated: Those who attain nirvana in the intermediate state are those who die from any class of gods of the form realm and are reborn in the intermediate state of any class of gods of the form realm.

original: skye ba'i srid pa mngon par ma grub pa'i skabs su phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i ngang tshul gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: skye ba'i srid pa mngon par ma grub pa'i skabs su phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i ngang tshul gang yin pa'o //
translated: They are those who are inclined to attain nirvana in the realm of nirvana without residual aggregates before the intermediate state of the next birth is completed.

original: de yang rnam pa gsum ste /üîΩshi 'phos ma thag kho nar bar ma do'i srid pa mngon par grub pa'i tshe bar ma do'i srid pa mngon par grub par byed cing mngon par grub pa dang / dus mnyam pa kho nar yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ste /üîΩdper na sbur ma'i me stag byung ma thag kho nar 'chi ba lta bu dang / bar ma do'i srid pa mngon par 'grub par byed cing bar ma do'i srid pa mngon par 'grub pa de la gnas pa'i dus gzhan gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' zhing skye ba'i srid pa ga la ba der ni da rung mi gzhol ba dper na lcags
analyzed: de yang rnam pa gsum ste / shi 'phos ma thag kho nar bar ma do'i srid pa mngon par grub pa'i tshe bar ma do'i srid pa mngon par grub par byed cing mngon par grub pa dang / dus mnyam pa kho nar yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ste / dper na sbur ma'i me stag byung ma thag kho nar 'chi ba lta bu dang / bar ma do'i srid pa mngon par 'grub par byed cing bar ma do'i srid pa mngon par 'grub pa de la gnas pa'i dus gzhan gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' zhing skye ba'i srid pa ga la ba der ni da rung mi gzhol ba dper na lcags
translated: That is also threefold:üîΩThose who attain nirvana in the intermediate state antaraparinirvayin after they have just died and the intermediate state has already been established.üîΩThose who attain nirvana in the intermediate state and who attain nirvana in the intermediate state after abiding for some time in the intermediate state without proceeding to the place of birth.

original: kyi thu lu ma mam lcags glebs pa mer bsregs shing rab tu 'bar ba dag lcags kyi tho ba dag gis brdungs pa na /
analyzed: kyi thu lu ma mam lcags glebs pa mer bsregs shing rab tu 'bar ba dag lcags kyi tho ba dag gis brdungs pa na /
translated: For example, it is like a spark that dies as soon as it appears or like a piece of iron that is heated and glows red and then becomes extinguished when it is struck by a hammer.

original: lcags kyi tshe tsha gnam du yar nas phyir ma log pa'i skabs kho nar 'chi ba lta bu dang / bar ma do'i srid pa mngon par 'grub par byed cing mngon par grub nas kyang skye ba'i srid pa ga la ba der gzhol bar byed la /
analyzed: lcags kyi tshe tsha gnam du yar nas phyir ma log pa'i skabs kho nar 'chi ba lta bu dang / bar ma do'i srid pa mngon par 'grub par byed cing mngon par grub nas kyang skye ba'i srid pa ga la ba der gzhol bar byed la /
translated: It is like the example of death when the iron spark has risen into the sky and has not yet returned.üîΩIt is the state of being that is about to be born, but has not yet been born.

original: gzhol nas kyang skye ba'i srid pa cung zad ma skyes pa'i skabs kho nar yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dper na lcags kyi tsha tsha de nyid gnam du yar nas phyir log ste sa la cung zad ma lhung ba'i skabs kho nar 'chi ba lta bu
analyzed: gzhol nas kyang skye ba'i srid pa cung zad ma skyes pa'i skabs kho nar yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dper na lcags kyi tsha tsha de nyid gnam du yar nas phyir log ste sa la cung zad ma lhung ba'i skabs kho nar 'chi ba lta bu
translated: It is like the example of death when the iron spark has risen into the sky and has not yet returned to the ground.

original: dag go // skyes nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dag go // skyes nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Those who attain nirvana after birth

original: gzugs kyi khams kyi lha'i ris gang yang rung bar skyes ma thag kho nar phung po'i lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i ngang tshul can gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams kyi lha'i ris gang yang rung bar skyes ma thag kho nar phung po'i lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i ngang tshul can gang yin pa'o //
translated: are those who attain nirvana by means of nirvana that is the remainder of the aggregates immediately after being born in any of the god realms of the form realm.

original: de yang rnam pa gsum ste /
analyzed: de yang rnam pa gsum ste /

analyzed: skyes nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba de nyid dang / de'i khyad par gnyis po mngon par du 'du byed pa dang bcas pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ste /
translated: the one who attains nirvana after being born, and the two who are distinguished from that one, who attain nirvana with exertion and without exertion.

analyzed: de dag thams cad kyang skyes nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: All of them are those who attain nirvana after being born.

original: mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba zhes bya ba ni mngon par 'du byed pa dang / 'bad pa dang / ngal bas lam mngon du byas shing der @72b skyes nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i ngang tshul can gang yin pa'o //

analyzed: mngon par 'du byed pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba zhes bya ba ni mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang / 'bad pa med pa dang / ngal ba med pas lam mngon du byas shing der skyes nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: The expression those who attain nirvana without any effort refers to those who attain nirvana in the very birthplace where they are reborn, without any effort, without any exertion, and without any travail.

original: gong du 'pho ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: gong du 'pho ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is a nonreturner who is bound for the upper realms?

original: gzugs kyi khams kyi lha'i ris gang du skyes pa de ni yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'i bar gang du 'gro ba'i rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i ngang tshul can gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams kyi lha'i ris gang du skyes pa de ni yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'i bar gang du 'gro ba'i rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i ngang tshul can gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is a nonreturner who is intent on attaining nirvana in the very birthplace where he is reborn, without passing through any other stage.

analyzed: de ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i sgo nas rnam pa gnyis te /

analyzed: rgyu'i sgo nas ni bsam gtan spel ba dang / bsam gtan ma spel ba gnyis so //
translated: According to the difference of cause, there is one who increases the meditation and one who does not increase the meditation.

analyzed: 'bras bu'i sgo nas ni 'og min gyi bar du 'gro ba dang / srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du 'gro ba gnyis so //

analyzed: de la gang gis bsam gtan spel ba de ni 'og min gyi bar du song nas der yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i ngang tshul can yin no //

analyzed: gang gis bsam gtan ma spel ba de ni srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du song nas der yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i ngang tshul can yin no //

translated: Those who transfer to a higher level and increase their absorption go as far as Akani·π£·π≠ha. They are of three types:

analyzed: 'phar ba dang / khyad par du 'phar ba dang / gnas thams cad du 'chi 'pho ba'o //

analyzed: de la 'phar ba zhes bya ba ni sngar 'dod pa'i khams 'dir bsam gtan bzhi ba thob pa zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa'i bsam gtan spel mar bsgoms pas bsam gtan gnyis pa dang gsum pa dang bzhi pa las nyams la bsam gtan dang
translated: Those who leap over are those who previously obtained the fourth absorption of the desire realm and cultivated it in combination with contaminated and uncontaminated absorption. They degenerate from the second, third, and fourth absorptions and obtain the first absorption.

analyzed: po las ni mnyams bsam gtan dang po'i ro myong ste /

original: tshangs ris su skyes nas /
analyzed: tshangs ris su skyes nas /
translated: is born in Brahmakayika.

original: bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum par mi skye bar sngon goms pa'i dbang gis bsam gtan bzhi ba'i so so'i skye bo'i gnas dang gnas gtsang ma'i zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa spel mar bsgoms te /
analyzed: bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum par mi skye bar sngon goms pa'i dbang gis bsam gtan bzhi ba'i so so'i skye bo'i gnas dang gnas gtsang ma'i zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa spel mar bsgoms te /
translated: One who is not born in the second or third absorptions but who cultivates the fourth absorption, alternating the uncontaminated and contaminated states of ordinary beings and pure abodes, in accordance with former habituation,

analyzed: tshangs ris nas shi 'phos nas gnas par ma dag tu mi skye ba thal byung 'og min du skye ba gang yin pa'o // phyed du 'phar zhes bya ba ni de nyid tshangs ris nas shi 'phos nas gnas gtsang ma lnga las dang po'am @73a * //
translated: is one who is born in Akani·π£·π≠ha without passing through intermediate abodes after dying in Brahmakayika.

original: gnyis pa'am gsum pa'am bzhi pa gang yang rung ba cig tu skyes la de nas shi 'phos nas 'og min du skye ba gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa'am gsum pa'am bzhi pa gang yang rung ba cig tu skyes la de nas shi 'phos nas 'og min du skye ba gang yin pa'o //
translated: One who is born in Akani·π£·π≠ha after passing through half is one who dies in Brahmakayika and is born in any of the first, second, third or fourth pure abodes and then is born in Akani·π£·π≠ha.

original: gnas thams cad 'chi 'pho ba zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyis bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa thams cad mthar gyis bskyed de spel nas /
analyzed: gnas thams cad 'chi 'pho ba zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyis bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa thams cad mthar gyis bskyed de spel nas /
translated: All abodes are death and rebirth means that he is reborn in all the abodes of the second, third and fourth absorptions, having generated and increased them in order.

original: tshangs ris nas 'og min gyi bar gyi gnas rnams las tshangs chen ma gtogs pa thams cad du skyes shing shi 'phos nas tha mar 'og min du skye ba gang yin pa'o //üîΩ'phags pa ni tshangs chen du mi skye ste /
analyzed: tshangs ris nas 'og min gyi bar gyi gnas rnams las tshangs chen ma gtogs pa thams cad du skyes shing shi 'phos nas tha mar 'og min du skye ba gang yin pa'o // 'phags pa ni tshangs chen du mi skye ste /
translated: He is reborn and dies in all the abodes from Brahmakayika to Akanistha, except Mahabrahma, and finally he is reborn in Akanistha.

original: lta ba'i gnas yin pa'i phyir dang gtso bo gcig tu zad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lta ba'i gnas yin pa'i phyir dang gtso bo gcig tu zad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Aryas are not reborn in Mahabrahma because it is a place of wrong views and because there is only one chief there.

original: bsam gtan spel ba zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan bzhi ba spel bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: bsam gtan spel ba zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan bzhi ba spel bar byed pa ste /
translated: Increasing the absorptions means increasing the fourth absorption.

original: bsam gtan de ni thams cad pa las su rung ba dang mngon par shes pa'i sla ba'i lam rnams kyi nang na mchog yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsam gtan de ni thams cad pa las su rung ba dang mngon par shes pa'i sla ba'i lam rnams kyi nang na mchog yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That absorption is the best of all the paths of easy practice that are serviceable for the fourth absorption and for the higher perception of the absorptions.

original: de yang 'di ltar spel bar byed de /
