original: de la ci'i phyir 'bras bu rnam pa bzhir rnam par gzhag ce na /
analyzed: de la ci'i phyir 'bras bu rnam pa bzhir rnam par gzhag ce na /
translated: Why are the results established as fourfold?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis spong ba'i lam gyi gnas skabs gang la rgyu lnga srid pa de la 'bras bur rnam par gzhag go //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis spong ba'i lam gyi gnas skabs gang la rgyu lnga srid pa de la 'bras bur rnam par gzhag go //
translated: The BhagavƒÅn established a state of the path of abandonment as a result when five causes are possible.

original: lnga gang zhe na /
analyzed: lnga gang zhe na /
translated: What are the five?

original: lam lnga ma btang ba dang / lam gzhan thob pa dang / spangs pa bsdus pa dang / shes pa brgyad thob pa dang / rnam pa bcu drug thob pa'o //üîΩde la @75a * //
analyzed: lam lnga ma btang ba dang / lam gzhan thob pa dang / spangs pa bsdus pa dang / shes pa brgyad thob pa dang / rnam pa bcu drug thob pa'o // de la @75a * //
translated: Not relinquishing the five paths, obtaining other paths, the inclusion of abandonment, obtaining the eight knowledges, and obtaining the sixteen aspects.

original: lam lnga ma btang ba ni zhugs pa bzhi'i lam btang ba'o //
analyzed: lam lnga ma btang ba ni zhugs pa bzhi'i lam btang ba'o //
translated: Not relinquishing the five paths is not relinquishing the paths of the four enterers.

original: lam gzhan thob pa ni 'bras bu la gnas pa bzhi'i lam thob pa'o //
analyzed: lam gzhan thob pa ni 'bras bu la gnas pa bzhi'i lam thob pa'o //
translated: Obtaining other paths is obtaining the paths of the four abiders in the result.

original: spangs pa bsdus pa ni 'bras bu bzhi'i gnas skabs na nyon mongs pa spangs pa thams cad kyi thob pa gcig rnyed pa'o //
analyzed: spangs pa bsdus pa ni 'bras bu bzhi'i gnas skabs na nyon mongs pa spangs pa thams cad kyi thob pa gcig rnyed pa'o //
translated: The inclusion of abandonment is obtaining one obtainment of all the afflictions abandoned in the state of the four results.

original: shes pa brgyad thob pa ni 'bras bu bzhi'i gnas skabs na chos shes pa bzhi dang / rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa thob pa bzhi rnyed pa'o //
analyzed: shes pa brgyad thob pa ni 'bras bu bzhi'i gnas skabs na chos shes pa bzhi dang / rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa thob pa bzhi rnyed pa'o //
translated: Attaining the eight knowledges is attaining the four Dharma knowledges and the four subsequent knowledges at the time of the four results.

original: rnam pa bcu drug thob pa ni 'bras bu bzhi'i gnas skabs na bden pa bzhi la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa la sogs pa bcu drug thob pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa bcu drug thob pa ni 'bras bu bzhi'i gnas skabs na bden pa bzhi la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa la sogs pa bcu drug thob pa ste /
translated: Attaining the sixteen aspects is attaining the sixteen aspects of the four truths such as impermanence at the time of the four results.

original: rgyu lnga po de dag ni 'bras bu bzhi po re re la yang lnga lnga yod do //
analyzed: rgyu lnga po de dag ni 'bras bu bzhi po re re la yang lnga lnga yod do //
translated: These five causes exist for each of the four results.

original: de la 'bras bu bzhi la gnas pa'i gang zag ji skad bstan pa de dag ni rigs kyi sgo nas rnam pa drug tu 'gyur te /
analyzed: de la 'bras bu bzhi la gnas pa'i gang zag ji skad bstan pa de dag ni rigs kyi sgo nas rnam pa drug tu 'gyur te /
translated: Those who abide in the four results are six types from the perspective of lineage.

original: so so'i skye bo dbang po rtul po dang rnon po'i rigs can gang yin pa de gnyis mthong ba'i lam la sems kyi skad cig bco lnga po rnams la dad pas rjes su 'brang ba dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ba gnyis su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: so so'i skye bo dbang po rtul po dang rnon po'i rigs can gang yin pa de gnyis mthong ba'i lam la sems kyi skad cig bco lnga po rnams la dad pas rjes su 'brang ba dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ba gnyis su 'gyur ro //
translated: Those who are ordinary beings with dull faculty and sharp faculty are the two types who follow faith and those who follow the dharma on the fifteen moments of the path of seeing.

original: de gnyis bsgom pa'i lam sems kyi skad cig ma bcu drug pa nas bzung ste /
analyzed: de gnyis bsgom pa'i lam sems kyi skad cig ma bcu drug pa nas bzung ste /
translated: The path of meditation is twofold:üîΩthose resolute in faith and those obtaining by insight.

original: srid pa'i rtse mo'i nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa dgu pa spong ba'i bar chad med pa'i lam gyi bar la dad pas mos pa dang / mthong bas thob pa zhes bya ba gnyis su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: srid pa'i rtse mo'i nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa dgu pa spong ba'i bar chad med pa'i lam gyi bar la dad pas mos pa dang / mthong bas thob pa zhes bya ba gnyis su 'gyur ro //
translated: Those resolute in faith and those obtaining by insight are the two types of persons on the path of meditation from the sixteenth moment of mind of the path of seeing until the uninterrupted path that abandons the ninth affliction of the summit of existence.

original: de gnyis mi slob pa'i lam la zad pa shes pa nas bzung ste /
analyzed: de gnyis mi slob pa'i lam la zad pa shes pa nas bzung ste /
translated: Those two are twofold on the path of no learning:

original: sems kyi skad cig ma tha ma mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar dus kyi rnam par grol ba dang / dus dang mi sbyor bar rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba gnyis su 'gyur te /
analyzed: sems kyi skad cig ma tha ma mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar dus kyi rnam par grol ba dang / dus dang mi sbyor bar rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba gnyis su 'gyur te /
translated: temporally liberated and nontemporally liberated.

original: dgra bcom pa rnam pa drug bstan pa dang po lnga dang / tha ma gcig dang / go rims bzhin no //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa rnam pa drug bstan pa dang po lnga dang / tha ma gcig dang / go rims bzhin no //
translated: Those two are the six types of arhat taught previously, the first five and the last one, respectively.

original: de ni 'bras bu thob pa'i rab tu dbye ba rnam par gzhag pa yin te /
analyzed: de ni 'bras bu thob pa'i rab tu dbye ba rnam par gzhag pa yin te /
translated: This is the presentation of the classification of those who obtain results.

original: bden pa rnams kyi rab tu dbye ba rnam par gzhag pa bshad zin to /
analyzed: bden pa rnams kyi rab tu dbye ba rnam par gzhag pa bshad zin to /
translated: The presentation of the classification of the four truths has been explained.

original: // / da la bden pa rnams kyi go rims rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na /üîΩyongs su shes par bya ba dang / spang bar bya ba dang / mngon sum du bya ba dang / bsgom par bya ba yin pa'i phyir bden pa bzhi po dag gi go rims sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang /
analyzed: // / da la bden pa rnams kyi go rims rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na / yongs su shes par bya ba dang / spang bar bya ba dang / mngon sum du bya ba dang / bsgom par bya ba yin pa'i phyir bden pa bzhi po dag gi go rims sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang /
translated: Now, what is the order of the truths?üîΩThe order of the four truths is established in accordance with the order in which they are to be thoroughly known, abandoned, manifested, and cultivated.

original: lam zhes bya ba de ltar rnam par @75b gzhag go //
analyzed: lam zhes bya ba de ltar rnam par @75b gzhag go //
translated: The truths are called suffering, origin, cessation, and path.

original: de la ci'i phyir sdug bsngal gyi bden pa yongs su shes par bya zhe na /
analyzed: de la ci'i phyir sdug bsngal gyi bden pa yongs su shes par bya zhe na /
translated: Why is the truth of suffering to be thoroughly known?

original: sdug bsngal gyi bden pa ni phyin ci log bzhi po rtag pa dang bde ba dang gtsang ba dang bdag tu phyin ci log ba'i gnas yin la /
analyzed: sdug bsngal gyi bden pa ni phyin ci log bzhi po rtag pa dang bde ba dang gtsang ba dang bdag tu phyin ci log ba'i gnas yin la /
translated: The truth of suffering is the basis of the four errors: the errors of permanence, happiness, purity, and self.

original: sdug bsngal gyi bden pa'i mtshan nyid ni mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang bdag med par so sor rig na phyin ci log bzhi spong bar 'gyur bas de'i phyir de ni dang por yongs su shes par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: sdug bsngal gyi bden pa'i mtshan nyid ni mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang bdag med par so sor rig na phyin ci log bzhi spong bar 'gyur bas de'i phyir de ni dang por yongs su shes par bya ba yin no //
translated: The four errors are abandoned by discerning the characteristics of the truth of suffering as impermanent, painful, empty, and insubstantial.

original: gang gi tshe bden pa bzhi po thams cad kyang yongs su shes par bya ba dag yin pa'i tshe ci'i phyir sdug bsngal gyi bden pa 'ba' zhig yongs su shes par bya zhes gsungs she na /
analyzed: gang gi tshe bden pa bzhi po thams cad kyang yongs su shes par bya ba dag yin pa'i tshe ci'i phyir sdug bsngal gyi bden pa 'ba' zhig yongs su shes par bya zhes gsungs she na /
translated: If all four truths are to be fully known, why is it said that the truth of suffering alone is to be fully known?

original: sdug bsngal gyi bden pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid dang / spyi'i mtshan nyid kyis yongs su shes par bya ba yin gyi /
analyzed: sdug bsngal gyi bden pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid dang / spyi'i mtshan nyid kyis yongs su shes par bya ba yin gyi /
translated: The truth of suffering is to be fully known by its specific and general characteristics.

original: de las gzhan pa'i bden pa gsum ni rang gi mtshan nyid kho na ste /
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i bden pa gsum ni rang gi mtshan nyid kho na ste /
translated: The other three truths are to be fully known by their specific characteristics alone.

original: kun 'byung ba'i bden pa la rgyu la sogs pa'i rnam pa dag gis yongs su shes par bya ba de yang de'i rang gi mtshan nyid yongs su shes par bya ba yin la /
analyzed: kun 'byung ba'i bden pa la rgyu la sogs pa'i rnam pa dag gis yongs su shes par bya ba de yang de'i rang gi mtshan nyid yongs su shes par bya ba yin la /
translated: The truth of origin is to be thoroughly known by means of aspects such as cause and so on, and that is also the thorough knowledge of its own reality.

original: 'gog pa'i bden pa la 'gog pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa dag gis yongs su shes par bya ba de yang de'i rang gi mtshan nyid yin /
analyzed: 'gog pa'i bden pa la 'gog pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa dag gis yongs su shes par bya ba de yang de'i rang gi mtshan nyid yin /
translated: The truth of cessation is to be thoroughly known by means of aspects such as cessation and so on, and that is also its own reality.

original: lam gyi bden pa la lam la sogs pa'i rnam pa dag gis yongs su shes par bya ba de yang de'i rang gi mtshan nyid yin pas de'i phyir mtshan nyid gnyis kyis mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam par yongs su shes par bya dgos pa'i sdug bsngal gyi bden pa 'ba' zhig yongs su shes par bya zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: lam gyi bden pa la lam la sogs pa'i rnam pa dag gis yongs su shes par bya ba de yang de'i rang gi mtshan nyid yin pas de'i phyir mtshan nyid gnyis kyis mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam par yongs su shes par bya dgos pa'i sdug bsngal gyi bden pa 'ba' zhig yongs su shes par bya zhes gsungs so //
translated: The truth of the path is to be thoroughly known by means of aspects such as path and so on, and that is also its own reality. Therefore, the truth of suffering alone is to be thoroughly known by means of the aspects of impermanence, suffering, emptiness, and selflessness, which are the two realities.

original: ci'i phyir kun 'byung gi bden pa spangs par bya zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir kun 'byung gi bden pa spangs par bya zhe na /
translated: Why is the truth of origin to be abandoned?

original: kun 'byung gi bden pa ni sdug bsngal gyi bden pas bsdus pa yin pa'i phyir sdug bsngal gyi bden pa yongs su shes su zin kyang da dung kun 'byung ba'i bden pa dang rjes su 'brel ba'i phyir /
analyzed: kun 'byung gi bden pa ni sdug bsngal gyi bden pas bsdus pa yin pa'i phyir sdug bsngal gyi bden pa yongs su shes su zin kyang da dung kun 'byung ba'i bden pa dang rjes su 'brel ba'i phyir /
translated: Because the truth of origin is included in the truth of suffering, even though the truth of suffering is already understood, the truth of origin is still related to it.

original: kun 'byung ba'i bden pa ni de'i 'og tu spang bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: kun 'byung ba'i bden pa ni de'i 'og tu spang bar bya ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, the truth of origin is to be abandoned after the truth of suffering.

original: gang gi tshe sdug bsngal gyi bden pa yang spang bar bya ba yin pa de'i tshe ci'i phyir kun 'byung ba'i bden pa 'ba' zhig spang bar bya zhes gsungs she na /
analyzed: gang gi tshe sdug bsngal gyi bden pa yang spang bar bya ba yin pa de'i tshe ci'i phyir kun 'byung ba'i bden pa 'ba' zhig spang bar bya zhes gsungs she na /
translated: If the truth of suffering is also to be abandoned, why is it said that only the truth of origin is to be abandoned?

original: sdug bsngal gyi bden pa spong pa ni kun 'byung ba'i bden pa spang bas rab tu phye ba yin te /
analyzed: sdug bsngal gyi bden pa spong pa ni kun 'byung ba'i bden pa spang bas rab tu phye ba yin te /
translated: The abandonment of the truth of suffering is distinguished by the abandonment of the truth of origin.

original: @76a * // de'i phyir kun 'byung ba'i bden pa 'ba' zhig spang bar bya zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: @76a * // de'i phyir kun 'byung ba'i bden pa 'ba' zhig spang bar bya zhes gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, it is said that only the truth of origin is to be abandoned.

original: ci'i phyir lam gyi bden pa bsgom par bya zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir lam gyi bden pa bsgom par bya zhe na /
translated: Why is the truth of path to be cultivated?

original: mngon sum du byas pa ni mngon sum du bya ba'i don yin pas de mngon du byas na 'gog pa mi skrag cing dga' ba yongs su 'dzin pa'i phyir 'gog pa'i bden pa ni de'i 'og tu mngon sum du bya ba yin no //
analyzed: mngon sum du byas pa ni mngon sum du bya ba'i don yin pas de mngon du byas na 'gog pa mi skrag cing dga' ba yongs su 'dzin pa'i phyir 'gog pa'i bden pa ni de'i 'og tu mngon sum du bya ba yin no //
translated: Since the object to be realized is the realization, when that is realized, one does not fear cessation and one obtains joy. Therefore, the truth of cessation is to be realized immediately after the truth of the path.

original: ci'i phyir lam gyi bden pa bsgom par bya zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir lam gyi bden pa bsgom par bya zhe na /
translated: Why is the truth of the path to be cultivated?

original: ji skad smos pa'i don gsum po dag bsgrub pa'i phyir lam goms par bya ba rtogs pas na lam gyi bden pa ni de'i 'og tu bsgom par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: ji skad smos pa'i don gsum po dag bsgrub pa'i phyir lam goms par bya ba rtogs pas na lam gyi bden pa ni de'i 'og tu bsgom par bya ba yin no //
translated: Since the path is to be cultivated in order to accomplish the three objects mentioned, the truth of the path is to be cultivated immediately after the truth of cessation.

original: go rims kyi rnam grangs gzhan yang gang gis sdug bsngal bar gyur pa de ni dang por bstan to //
analyzed: go rims kyi rnam grangs gzhan yang gang gis sdug bsngal bar gyur pa de ni dang por bstan to //
translated: Another enumeration of the order is this: First, the truth of suffering is taught, since it is the basis of the truth of origin.

original: ji ltar sdug bsngal bar gyur pa de ni gnyis pa yin no //üîΩnag po'i phyogs gtugs nas yang gang gis bde bar gyur pa de ni gsum pa yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar sdug bsngal bar gyur pa de ni gnyis pa yin no // nag po'i phyogs gtugs nas yang gang gis bde bar gyur pa de ni gsum pa yin no //
translated: Second, the truth of origin is taught, since it is the cause of the truth of suffering.üîΩThird, the truth of cessation is taught, since it is the cessation of the truth of suffering and origin.

original: ji ltar bde bar gyur ba de ni bzhi pa yin te /
analyzed: ji ltar bde bar gyur ba de ni bzhi pa yin te /
translated: Fourth, the truth of the path is taught, since it is the means of attaining the truth of cessation.

original: dper na nad dang ; de'i rgyu dang / nad med pa dang / sman lta bu yin no //
analyzed: dper na nad dang ; de'i rgyu dang / nad med pa dang / sman lta bu yin no //
translated: For example, it is like a disease, its cause, the absence of the disease, and medicine.

original: rnam grangs gzhan yang 'jig rten pa'i sdug bsngal 'byung ba'i go rims bzhin du bden pa rnams kyi go rims gzhag par bya ste /
analyzed: rnam grangs gzhan yang 'jig rten pa'i sdug bsngal 'byung ba'i go rims bzhin du bden pa rnams kyi go rims gzhag par bya ste /
translated: There is another method of explanation: the order of the truths is established in accordance with the order in which the mundane realities of suffering, etc.üîΩ, arise.

original: 'jig rten pa dag ni dang por sdug bsngal gang yang rung ba zhig gis thebs pa na de la rtogs par byed do //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa dag ni dang por sdug bsngal gang yang rung ba zhig gis thebs pa na de la rtogs par byed do //
translated: For, when people are afflicted by some suffering, they first of all seek to determine what that suffering is.

original: de'i 'og tu de dag las byung ba la'o //üîΩde'i 'og tu de las thar pa la'o //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu de dag las byung ba la'o // de'i 'og tu de las thar pa la'o //
translated: Then, they seek to determine what its cause is.üîΩThen, they seek to determine what the cessation of that suffering is.

original: de'i 'og tu de las thar ba'i thabs rtogs par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu de las thar ba'i thabs rtogs par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Then, they seek to determine what the means to that cessation is.

original: de'i bden pa rnams kyi go rims rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i bden pa rnams kyi go rims rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
translated: This is the order of the truths.

original: de la bden pa rnams kyi bsdu ba rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na ;
analyzed: de la bden pa rnams kyi bsdu ba rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na ;
translated: What is the definition of the inclusion of the truths?

original: bden pa bzhi las sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang / lam gsum ni 'dus byas yin la /
analyzed: bden pa bzhi las sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang / lam gsum ni 'dus byas yin la /
translated: Three of the four noble truths are conditioned: suffering, origination, and the path.

original: 'gog pa ni 'dus ma byas yin pas sngar phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / srid pa'i yan lag dang / gnas dang gnas ma yin pa dang / dbang po rnams la 'dus byas pa dang 'dus ma byas kyi phyogs gang gis bsdus pa kho na bzhin du blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'gog pa ni 'dus ma byas yin pas sngar phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / srid pa'i yan lag dang / gnas dang gnas ma yin pa dang / dbang po rnams la 'dus byas pa dang 'dus ma byas kyi phyogs gang gis bsdus pa kho na bzhin du blta bar bya'o //
translated: Cessation is unconditioned, so it should be seen as included in the same way as the conditioned and unconditioned factors in the aggregates, elements, sense bases, limbs of existence, and faculties, as previously explained.

original: de ni bden pa rnams kyi bsdu ba rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni bden pa rnams kyi bsdu ba rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
translated: This is the presentation of the inclusion of the truths.

original: de la bden pa rnams kyi rten rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la bden pa rnams kyi rten rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the presentation of the basis of the truths?

original: sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang / lam gyi phung po lngas bsdus pa @76b yin pas sngar phung po lnga'i rten ji skad bstan pa la brten par ci rigs par sbyar ro //
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang / lam gyi phung po lngas bsdus pa @76b yin pas sngar phung po lnga'i rten ji skad bstan pa la brten par ci rigs par sbyar ro //
translated: Since the aggregates of suffering, origin, and path are included in the five aggregates, they are based on whatever is explained as the basis of the five aggregates.

original: 'gog pa ni ci la yang mi rten mi gnas par brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: 'gog pa ni ci la yang mi rten mi gnas par brjod par bya ste /
translated: Cessation should be explained as not based on anything.

original: de ni bden pa rnams kyi rten rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni bden pa rnams kyi rten rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
translated: This is the presentation of the basis of the truths.

original: de ltar bden pa rnams kyi rten rnam par gzhag pa ji skad bstan pa de dag gis sems can skyes shing 'byung ba rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba'i phyir des ni de'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba'iüîΩdngos po bstan to //
analyzed: de ltar bden pa rnams kyi rten rnam par gzhag pa ji skad bstan pa de dag gis sems can skyes shing 'byung ba rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba'i phyir des ni de'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba'i dngos po bstan to //
translated: The reality of defilement and purification is taught by the above presentation of the reality of the bases of the truths, because beings who are born and exist are defiled and purified.

original: de'i sna tshogs kyi dngos po zhes bya bas ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bstan te /
analyzed: de'i sna tshogs kyi dngos po zhes bya bas ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bstan te /
translated: The reality of variety is taught by the above presentation of the reality of the bases of the truths, because the variety of the world is due to the variety of the bases.üîΩThe reality of dependent origination is taught by the above presentation of the reality of the bases of the truths, because the dependent origination of the world is due to the bases.

original: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo nyid kyi chos kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i phyogs su gtogs pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo nyid kyi chos kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i phyogs su gtogs pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: Dependent origination is the dependent origination of all things that are included in the realms of defilement and purification, which are the relative natures.

original: de yang rnam pa drug gis rnam par gzhag ste /
analyzed: de yang rnam pa drug gis rnam par gzhag ste /
translated: It is presented in six ways:

original: ngo bo nyid dang / don dang / rab tu dbye ba dang / go rims dang / bsdu ba dang / rten gyis so ;
analyzed: ngo bo nyid dang / don dang / rab tu dbye ba dang / go rims dang / bsdu ba dang / rten gyis so ;
translated: by nature, by meaning, by classification, by order, by inclusion, and by basis.

original: / de la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i ngo bo nyid rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: / de la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i ngo bo nyid rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the definition of dependent origination?

original: nang dang phyi rol gyi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dgu dang / rkyen dang / 'bras bu rab tu dbye ba gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: nang dang phyi rol gyi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dgu dang / rkyen dang / 'bras bu rab tu dbye ba gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the internal and external dependent origination in nine parts, the classification of conditions and results.

analyzed: rlan dang bcas pa'i sa bon ni sred pa dang bcas pa'i las dang chu'i rlan dang bcas pa'i lo tog gi sa bon no //
translated: The seed with moisture is the seed of the crop, which is impregnated by water and action, along with craving.

original: phrad nas 'gag pa ni 'gags ma thag pa'i rkyen no //
analyzed: phrad nas 'gag pa ni 'gags ma thag pa'i rkyen no //
translated: The cessation through contact is the condition that has just ceased.

original: yul ni dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: yul ni dmigs pa'o //
translated: The object is the objective support.

original: dbang po ni bdag po'o //
analyzed: dbang po ni bdag po'o //
translated: The sense faculty is the dominant influence.

original: byed pa ni 'du byed rnams dang rang rang gi las byed pa'o //
analyzed: byed pa ni 'du byed rnams dang rang rang gi las byed pa'o //
translated: The activity is the performance of the function of the formative forces.

original: skyes bu'i byed pa ni bya ba sgrub pa'i phyir @78b skyes bu'i rtsol ba'o //
analyzed: skyes bu'i byed pa ni bya ba sgrub pa'i phyir @78b skyes bu'i rtsol ba'o //
translated: The human activity is the human effort, because it is the cause of the accomplishment of the action.

original: de kho na la lta ba'i 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba'o //
analyzed: de kho na la lta ba'i 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba'o //
translated: The view is the mundane and supramundane right view that sees reality.

original: mthun pa ni rigs mthun pa'o //
analyzed: mthun pa ni rigs mthun pa'o //
translated: The similarity is the homogeneity.

original: mthu sna tshogs ni 'du byed rnams kyi so so'i nus pa tha dad pa'o //
analyzed: mthu sna tshogs ni 'du byed rnams kyi so so'i nus pa tha dad pa'o //
translated: The various powers are the different potencies of the formations.

original: tshogs pa ni lhan cig 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: tshogs pa ni lhan cig 'byung ba'o //
translated: The assemblage is the simultaneous occurrence.

original: bar du gcod pa ni skye ba la sogs pa la bar chad byed pa'o //
analyzed: bar du gcod pa ni skye ba la sogs pa la bar chad byed pa'o //
translated: The obstruction is that which obstructs the arising, etc.

original: bar du gcod pa ma yin pa ni skye ba la sogs pa la bar chad mi byed pa ste /
analyzed: bar du gcod pa ma yin pa ni skye ba la sogs pa la bar chad mi byed pa ste /
translated: The non-obstruction is that which does not obstruct the arising, etc.

original: de dag ni rgyu dang rkyen dang 'bras bu'i gnas yin no //
analyzed: de dag ni rgyu dang rkyen dang 'bras bu'i gnas yin no //
translated: These are the categories of cause, condition, and effect.

original: de la rgyu dang rkyen dang 'bras bu'i rab tu dbye ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rgyu dang rkyen dang 'bras bu'i rab tu dbye ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the classification of cause, condition, and effect?

original: rgyu bcu dang rkyen bzhi dang / 'bras bu lnga ste /
analyzed: rgyu bcu dang rkyen bzhi dang / 'bras bu lnga ste /
translated: There are ten causes, four conditions, and five effects.

original: de la rgyu bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rgyu bcu gang zhe na /
translated: What are the ten causes?

original: rjes su tha snyad 'dogs pa'i rgyu dang / ltos pa'i rgyu dang / 'phen pa'i rgyu dang / mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu dang / yongs su 'dzin pa'i rgyu dang / 'dren pa'i rgyu dang / so sor nges pa'i rgyu dang / lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu dang /
analyzed: rjes su tha snyad 'dogs pa'i rgyu dang / ltos pa'i rgyu dang / 'phen pa'i rgyu dang / mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu dang / yongs su 'dzin pa'i rgyu dang / 'dren pa'i rgyu dang / so sor nges pa'i rgyu dang / lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu dang /
translated: The cause of designation, the cause of dependence, the projecting cause, the productive cause, the cause of the same status, the cause of the good state, the cause of separation, the cause of leading, the cause of the specific state, and the co-operating cause.

original: mi mthun pa'i rgyu dang / mi mthun pa med pa'i rgyu'o //
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i rgyu dang / mi mthun pa med pa'i rgyu'o //
translated: the cause of disagreement and the cause of non-disagreement.

original: de la rjes su tha snyad 'dogs pa'i rgyu gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rjes su tha snyad 'dogs pa'i rgyu gang zhe na /
translated: What is the cause of the designation of conventional expressions?

original: chos thams cad kyi ming dang ming sngon du 'gro ba'i 'du shes dang / 'du shes sngon du 'gro ba'i brjod pa gang yin pa de ni chos de dang de dag gis rjes su tha snyad 'dogs pa'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi ming dang ming sngon du 'gro ba'i 'du shes dang / 'du shes sngon du 'gro ba'i brjod pa gang yin pa de ni chos de dang de dag gis rjes su tha snyad 'dogs pa'i rgyu yin no //
translated: It is the name of all things, the perception preceded by the name, and the expression preceded by perception. This is the cause of the designation of conventional expressions in regard to all things.

original: ltos pa'i rgyu gang zhe na /
analyzed: ltos pa'i rgyu gang zhe na /
translated: What is the cause of dependence?

original: gzhi gang las ltos shing rgyu gang gis dngos po gang la 'dod pa dang len par 'gyur ba de ni de'i ltos pa'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: gzhi gang las ltos shing rgyu gang gis dngos po gang la 'dod pa dang len par 'gyur ba de ni de'i ltos pa'i rgyu yin no //
translated: It is the cause of the desire and attachment of a thing in dependence on a basis.

original: 'phen pa'i rgyu gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'phen pa'i rgyu gang zhe na /
translated: What is the cause of projection?

original: sa bon ni rang gi 'bras bu tha ma'i bar gyis 'phen pa'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: sa bon ni rang gi 'bras bu tha ma'i bar gyis 'phen pa'i rgyu yin no //
translated: The seed is the cause of the projection of its effect up to the last moment of the actual world.

original: mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu gang zhe na /
analyzed: mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu gang zhe na /
translated: What is the cause of actualization?

original: sa bon de nyid ni rang gi 'bras bu mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: sa bon de nyid ni rang gi 'bras bu mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu yin no //
translated: The seed is the cause of the actualization of its effect.

original: yongs su 'dzin pa'i rgyu gang zhe na /
analyzed: yongs su 'dzin pa'i rgyu gang zhe na /
translated: What is the cause of possession?

original: sa bon ma gtogs pa de las gzhan pa'i rkyen rnams ni yongs su 'dzin pa'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: sa bon ma gtogs pa de las gzhan pa'i rkyen rnams ni yongs su 'dzin pa'i rgyu yin no //
translated: All conditions except the seed are the supporting cause.

original: 'dren pa'i rgyu gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'dren pa'i rgyu gang zhe na /
translated: What is the leading cause?

original: sa bon las 'grub pa'i 'bras bu de ni sa bon gyis 'phangs pa'i 'bras bu phyi ma'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: sa bon las 'grub pa'i 'bras bu de ni sa bon gyis 'phangs pa'i 'bras bu phyi ma'i rgyu yin no //
translated: The seed is the leading cause of the fruit that is produced from the seed.

original: so sor nges pa'i rgyu gang zhe na /
analyzed: so sor nges pa'i rgyu gang zhe na /
translated: What is the determining cause?

original: chos rnam pa sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa'i rang rang gi rgyu ni so sor nges pa'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: chos rnam pa sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa'i rang rang gi rgyu ni so sor nges pa'i rgyu yin no //
translated: The determining cause is the cause of the various and different natures of the various and different phenomena.

original: lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu gang zhe na /
analyzed: lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu gang zhe na /
translated: What is the cooperating cause?

original: ltos pa'i rgyu dang / 'phen pa'i rgyu dang / mngon par 'grub ba'i rgyu dang / yongs su 'dzin pa'i rgyu dang / 'dren pa'i rgyu dang / so sor nges pa'i rgyu gang yin pa de dag thams cad @79a * //
analyzed: ltos pa'i rgyu dang / 'phen pa'i rgyu dang / mngon par 'grub ba'i rgyu dang / yongs su 'dzin pa'i rgyu dang / 'dren pa'i rgyu dang / so sor nges pa'i rgyu gang yin pa de dag thams cad @79a * //
translated: All the above mentioned causes, the antecedent cause, the projecting cause, the productive cause, the supporting cause, the leading cause and the determining cause,

original: gcig tu bsdus pa ni lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: gcig tu bsdus pa ni lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu yin no //
translated: are included in the cooperating cause.

original: mi mthun pa'i rgyu gang zhe na /
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i rgyu gang zhe na /
translated: What is the incompatible cause?

original: skye ba la sogs pa la bar du gcod pa'i rgyu mi mthun pa'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: skye ba la sogs pa la bar du gcod pa'i rgyu mi mthun pa'i rgyu yin no //
translated: The cause of non-obstruction is the cause of the non-obstruction of arising, etc.

original: mi mthun pa med pa'i rgyu gang zhe na /
analyzed: mi mthun pa med pa'i rgyu gang zhe na /
translated: What is the cause of non-separation?

original: skye ba la sogs pa la bar du gcod pa med pa'i rgyu ni mi mthun pa med pa'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: skye ba la sogs pa la bar du gcod pa med pa'i rgyu ni mi mthun pa med pa'i rgyu yin no //
translated: The cause of non-obstruction of arising, etc. is the cause of non-separation.

original: rgyu bcu po de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i lo tog la sogs pa lung du ma bstan pa'i dngos po thams cad dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i phyogs kyi dngos po thams cad phyin ci ma log par 'gyur ba'i rgyu yin te /
analyzed: rgyu bcu po de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i lo tog la sogs pa lung du ma bstan pa'i dngos po thams cad dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i phyogs kyi dngos po thams cad phyin ci ma log par 'gyur ba'i rgyu yin te /
translated: These ten causes are the causes of the non-erroneous production of all neutral things such as the crops of the world, and of all things pertaining to the aspects of defilement and purification.

original: de la rgyu bcu po de dag gis 'jig rten pa'i dngos po thams cad ni ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur /üîΩkun nas nyon mongs pa ni ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: de la rgyu bcu po de dag gis 'jig rten pa'i dngos po thams cad ni ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur / kun nas nyon mongs pa ni ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: How do these ten causes produce all worldly things?üîΩHow do they produce defilement?

original: rnam par byang ba ni ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: rnam par byang ba ni ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How do they produce purification?

original: 'di ltar 'jig rten na 'bru'i grangs su gtogs pa'i lo tog gang dag gis 'jig rten 'di 'tsho bar byed pa gang yin pa de dag gi ming dang / 'du shes dang tshig tu brjod pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'jig rten na 'bru'i grangs su gtogs pa'i lo tog gang dag gis 'jig rten 'di 'tsho bar byed pa gang yin pa de dag gi ming dang / 'du shes dang tshig tu brjod pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'di lta ste /
translated: In this way, the various names, concepts, and expressions that designate the crops that belong to the category of grains and that sustain the world are as follows:üîΩbarley, rice, wheat, sesame, beans, and so on.

original: nas dang / 'bras dang / s'a lu dang / gro dang / til dang / sran ma la sogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'di ni de dag gi tha snyad du khyer te shog / thogs shig / zhog cig ces bya ba la sogs pa'i rjes su tha snyad 'dogs pa'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: nas dang / 'bras dang / s'a lu dang / gro dang / til dang / sran ma la sogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'di ni de dag gi tha snyad du khyer te shog / thogs shig / zhog cig ces bya ba la sogs pa'i rjes su tha snyad 'dogs pa'i rgyu yin no //
translated: This is the cause for the conventional designations such as ‚ÄúBring it! Take it! Put it down!‚Äù

original: bkres pa dang / skom pa dang / nyam chung ba dang / lus gnas par bya ba la ltos pa dang / kham gyi zas kyi myang bar bya ba la ltos nas /
analyzed: bkres pa dang / skom pa dang / nyam chung ba dang / lus gnas par bya ba la ltos pa dang / kham gyi zas kyi myang bar bya ba la ltos nas /
translated: In dependence on hunger, thirst, weakness, the maintenance of the body, and the experience of oral food,

original: nas la sogs pa de dag 'dod pa dang / tshol ba dang / len pa dang / longs spyod par byed pa 'di ni de dag gi ltos pa'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: nas la sogs pa de dag 'dod pa dang / tshol ba dang / len pa dang / longs spyod par byed pa 'di ni de dag gi ltos pa'i rgyu yin no //
translated: the desire for barley and so on, the search for it, the taking of it, and the enjoyment of it are the causes of dependence on them.

original: nas la sogs pa'i rang rang gi sa bon gang dang gang la lo tog gang dang gang 'byung ba'i sa bon de ni de'i 'phen pa'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: nas la sogs pa'i rang rang gi sa bon gang dang gang la lo tog gang dang gang 'byung ba'i sa bon de ni de'i 'phen pa'i rgyu yin no //
translated: The seed of each crop, such as barley, etc., is the projecting cause of that crop.

original: sa bon de ni myu gu de'i mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: sa bon de ni myu gu de'i mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu yin no //
translated: The seed is the cause of the production of the sprout.

original: sa dang char pa la sogs pa'i rkyen las myu gu 'byung bar 'gyur ba de ni de'i yongs su 'dzin pa'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: sa dang char pa la sogs pa'i rkyen las myu gu 'byung bar 'gyur ba de ni de'i yongs su 'dzin pa'i rgyu yin no //
translated: The conditions, such as earth, water, etc., are the supporting cause of the sprout.

original: myu gu dang sdong bu dang lo ma gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i rgyun de ni lo tog de 'grub pa dang yongs su smin pa'i 'dren pa'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: myu gu dang sdong bu dang lo ma gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i rgyun de ni lo tog de 'grub pa dang yongs su smin pa'i 'dren pa'i rgyu yin no //
translated: The series of the sprout, stem, leaf, etc., is the cause of the production and ripening of the crop.

original: nas kyi sa bon las kyang nas kyi myu gu dang nas kyi lo tog 'byung bar 'gyur gyi gzhan ma yin la /
analyzed: nas kyi sa bon las kyang nas kyi myu gu dang nas kyi lo tog 'byung bar 'gyur gyi gzhan ma yin la /
translated: The barley sprout and the barley crop arise from the barley seed, not from another seed.

original: @79b 'bru gzhan dag las kyang de bzhin pa de ni de dag gi so sor nges pa'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: @79b 'bru gzhan dag las kyang de bzhin pa de ni de dag gi so sor nges pa'i rgyu yin no //
translated: The fact that each seed produces its own crop is the cause of the individual differentiation.

original: ltos pa'i rgyu nas bzung ste /
analyzed: ltos pa'i rgyu nas bzung ste /
translated: The cause of dependence is from the projecting cause up to the supporting cause.

original: so sor nges pa'i rgyu la thug pa'i bar gyi rgyu drug po de dag thams cad cig tu bsdus pa ni log tog de 'grub pa'i lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu yin no //

translated: All six causes, from the cause of the very nature of things up to the cause of the particular result, are included in the productive cause of the crop.

original: ser ba dang lo tog la gnod pa 'byung ba la sogs pa bar du gcod pa rnams ni de'i mi mthun pa'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: ser ba dang lo tog la gnod pa 'byung ba la sogs pa bar du gcod pa rnams ni de'i mi mthun pa'i rgyu yin no //
translated: The hail, frost, and other adverse conditions are the adverse causes of the crop.

original: de dag med de bar du gcod pa med pa ni mi mthun pa med pa'i rgyu yin te /
analyzed: de dag med de bar du gcod pa med pa ni mi mthun pa med pa'i rgyu yin te /
translated: The absence of these adverse conditions is the non-adverse cause.

original: de ltar rgyu bcu po de dag ni 'bru bsdus pa rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du de las gzhan pa'i 'jig rten pa'i dngos po dag la yang ci rigs par sbyar bar rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar rgyu bcu po de dag ni 'bru bsdus pa rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du de las gzhan pa'i 'jig rten pa'i dngos po dag la yang ci rigs par sbyar bar rig par bya'o //
translated: These ten causes should be applied to other worldly things as appropriate, just as they are to the collection of grains.

original: de la kun nas nyon mongs par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de la kun nas nyon mongs par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How does this relate to the process of affliction?

original: 'di ltar rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba thams cad kyi ming dang 'du shes dang / tshig tu brjod pa 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba thams cad kyi ming dang 'du shes dang / tshig tu brjod pa 'di lta ste /

analyzed: ma rig pa dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs nas /

analyzed: rgyas par rga shi dang / ma ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa zhes bya ba'i bar de ni re zhig kun nas nyon mongs pa'i tha snyad ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba nas skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rjes su tha snyad 'dogs pa'i rgyu yin no //

analyzed: bde ba la sogs pa'i yul myong ba la ltos nas srid pa'i yan lag 'di dag 'jug pa de ni /

analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa de'i ltos pa'i rgyu yin no //

analyzed: de la 'phen pa'i rgyu dang / mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu gnyis ni bskyed pa'i rgyu yin no //
translated: The projecting cause and the establishing cause are the productive cause.

original: rgyu lhag ma brgyad ni thabs kyi rgyu yin par rig par bya ste /
analyzed: rgyu lhag ma brgyad ni thabs kyi rgyu yin par rig par bya ste /

original: de ni rgyu'i rab tu dbye ba yin no //üîΩde la rkyen bzhi @81a * //
analyzed: de ni rgyu'i rab tu dbye ba yin no // de la rkyen bzhi @81a * //
translated: This is the classification of causes.

original: gang zhe na /
analyzed: gang zhe na /
translated: What are the four conditions?

original: rgyu'i rkyen dang / de ma thag pa'i rkyen dang / dmigs pa'i rkyen dang / bdag po'i rkyen no //
analyzed: rgyu'i rkyen dang / de ma thag pa'i rkyen dang / dmigs pa'i rkyen dang / bdag po'i rkyen no //
translated: The causal condition, the immediately preceding condition, the objective condition, and the dominant condition.

original: de la rgyu'i rkyen gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rgyu'i rkyen gang zhe na /
translated: What is the causal condition?

original: sa bon thams cad pa kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: sa bon thams cad pa kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the consciousness of the store of seeds, the alaya.

original: phyi rol gyi dngos po dag la yang 'phen pa'i rgyu dang mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyur grags pa thams cad ni rgyu'i rkyen yin no //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi dngos po dag la yang 'phen pa'i rgyu dang mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyur grags pa thams cad ni rgyu'i rkyen yin no //
translated: All the causes of projection and of actualization of external things are the causal condition.

original: de ma thag pa'i rkyen gang zhe na /
analyzed: de ma thag pa'i rkyen gang zhe na /
translated: What is the condition as the equivalent and immediate antecedent?

original: sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos gang dag gi mjug thogs su sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos gang dag byung ba de dag ni de dag gi de ma thag pa'i rkyen zhes bya'o //
analyzed: sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos gang dag gi mjug thogs su sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos gang dag byung ba de dag ni de dag gi de ma thag pa'i rkyen zhes bya'o //
translated: The condition as the equivalent and immediate antecedent is the mind and mental activities which arise immediately after the mind and mental activities have ceased.

original: rnam par shes pa drug po 'gags ma thag pa gang yin pa de dag gi rnam par shes pa drug po gang dag de'i mjug thogs su skye ba ni de ma thag pa'i rkyen yin te /üîΩde dag ni 'gags so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa drug po 'gags ma thag pa gang yin pa de dag gi rnam par shes pa drug po gang dag de'i mjug thogs su skye ba ni de ma thag pa'i rkyen yin te / de dag ni 'gags so //
translated: The six consciousnesses which have just ceased are the condition as the equivalent and immediate antecedent for the six consciousnesses which arise immediately after.üîΩThey are called the condition as the equivalent and immediate antecedent because they are the immediate antecedent of the arising of the six consciousnesses.

original: yid las yid ces bya ba dang / yid kyi skye mched ces bya ba dang / yid kyi khams zhes bya bar yang btags so ;
analyzed: yid las yid ces bya ba dang / yid kyi skye mched ces bya ba dang / yid kyi khams zhes bya bar yang btags so ;
translated: The mind is designated as the mental sense-faculty, the sense-sphere of the mind and the element of the mind.

original: / dmigs pa'i rkyen gang zhe na /
analyzed: / dmigs pa'i rkyen gang zhe na /
translated: What is the objective condition?

original: gzugs la sogs pa yul lnga po dag ni rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga po dag ni dmigs pa'i rkyen yin no //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa yul lnga po dag ni rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga po dag ni dmigs pa'i rkyen yin no //
translated: The five objects, form, etc., are the objective conditions of the five groups of consciousness.

original: nang dang phyi rol gyi skye mched bcu gnyis po thams cad ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i dmigs pa'i rkyen yin no //
analyzed: nang dang phyi rol gyi skye mched bcu gnyis po thams cad ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i dmigs pa'i rkyen yin no //
translated: All twelve bases, internal and external, are the objective conditions of mental consciousness.

original: bdag po'i rkyen gang zhe na /
analyzed: bdag po'i rkyen gang zhe na /
translated: What is the dominant condition?

original: mig la sogs pa'i skye mched lhan cig 'byung ba rnams ni mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa'i bdag po'i rkyen yin no //
analyzed: mig la sogs pa'i skye mched lhan cig 'byung ba rnams ni mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa'i bdag po'i rkyen yin no //
translated: The eye and the other sense faculties that occur together are the dominant conditions of visual consciousness, etc.

original: rnam par shes pa rnams dmigs pa la gtod par byed pa'i yid la byed pa la yang rnam par shes pa rnams kyi bdag po'i rkyen yin no //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa rnams dmigs pa la gtod par byed pa'i yid la byed pa la yang rnam par shes pa rnams kyi bdag po'i rkyen yin no //
translated: Also, attention that directs consciousness to the object is the dominant condition of consciousness.

original: sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos lhan cig byung ba rnams kyang gcig gi bdag po'i rkyen gcig yin pas bdag po'i rkyen yin no //
analyzed: sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos lhan cig byung ba rnams kyang gcig gi bdag po'i rkyen gcig yin pas bdag po'i rkyen yin no //
translated: Also, the mind and mental activities that occur together are the dominant condition of each other.

original: dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las sngon byas pa rnams dang phyis 'bras bu 'dod pa dang mi 'dod pa rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i bdag po'i rkyen yin no //
analyzed: dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las sngon byas pa rnams dang phyis 'bras bu 'dod pa dang mi 'dod pa rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i bdag po'i rkyen yin no //
translated: The dominant condition of the action previously performed, whether virtuous or nonvirtuous, is the cause of the subsequent maturation of the desired or undesired fruit.

original: zhing dang lud dang chu la sogs pa ni lo tog mngon par 'grub pa'i bdag po'i rkyen yin no //
analyzed: zhing dang lud dang chu la sogs pa ni lo tog mngon par 'grub pa'i bdag po'i rkyen yin no //
translated: The dominant condition of the production of the crop is the field, the fertilizer, the water, etc.

original: bzo shes pa dang bzo'i las dang de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i bzo dang las kyi gnas de dang de dag mngon par 'grub pa'i bdag po'i rkyen yin no //
analyzed: bzo shes pa dang bzo'i las dang de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i bzo dang las kyi gnas de dang de dag mngon par 'grub pa'i bdag po'i rkyen yin no //
translated: The dominant condition of the production of the various worldly arts and crafts is the knowledge of the craft, the craft itself, and the practice of the craft.

original: de la rgyu'i rkyen ni rgyu yang yin rkyen yang yin te skyed pa'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: de la rgyu'i rkyen ni rgyu yang yin rkyen yang yin te skyed pa'i rgyu yin no //
translated: Among these, the causal condition is both a cause and a condition, because it is the generating cause.

analyzed: de la yang bdag po'i rkyen ni gtso cher thabs kyi rgyu thams cad yin no //

translated: The immediately preceding condition and the objective condition should be understood as the causal conditions of the method of the cause that is included in the cause of complete assumption. This is the analysis of the conditions.

original: / de la 'bras bu lnga gang zhe na /

original: bral ba'i 'bras bu gang zhe na /

analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas nyon mongs pa 'gog pa gang yin pa de ni bral ba'i 'bras bu'o //

original: skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu gang zhe na /
analyzed: skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu gang zhe na /

analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar yang yid kyi dbang po'i bar gyi bdag po'i 'bras bu'o //

translated: It is because the various natures of the phenomena of the desire realm, the form realm, and the formless realm, whether they are possessed or not possessed, arise from the various powers of the various specific natures.

original: / de bas na mthu tshogs la brten nas so sor nges pa'i rgyu 'dogs so //
analyzed: / de bas na mthu tshogs la brten nas so sor nges pa'i rgyu 'dogs so //
translated: Therefore, the designation of a cause that is definite in terms of each individual is made in dependence on the collection of powers.

original: de la rgyu'i gnas tshogs pa la brten nas lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu 'dogs par byed de /
analyzed: de la rgyu'i gnas tshogs pa la brten nas lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu 'dogs par byed de /
translated: The designation of a co-originating cause is made in dependence on the collection of the basis of the cause.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa dang ldan pa dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams rang skye ba'i tshogs pa dang phrad nas skye ba dang skye ba'i tshogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'thob pa dang 'grub par 'gyur ba dang grub pa
analyzed: 'di ltar 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa dang ldan pa dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams rang skye ba'i tshogs pa dang phrad nas skye ba dang skye ba'i tshogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'thob pa dang 'grub par 'gyur ba dang grub pa
translated: When they meet with the assembly of causes for their establishment, they are established.üîΩWhen they meet with the assembly of causes for their duration, they endure.

original: dang gnas pa dang byed pa'i tshogs pa dang phrad na byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: dang gnas pa dang byed pa'i tshogs pa dang phrad na byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
translated: When they meet with the assembly of causes for their function, they function.

original: de bas na tshos pa la brten nas lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu 'dogs so //
analyzed: de bas na tshos pa la brten nas lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu 'dogs so //
translated: Therefore, the designation of cooperative causes is made in dependence on phenomena.

original: de la rgyu'i gnas par du gcod pa la brten nas mi mthun pa'i rgyu 'dogs par byed de /
analyzed: de la rgyu'i gnas par du gcod pa la brten nas mi mthun pa'i rgyu 'dogs par byed de /
translated: The designation of opposing causes is made in dependence on the obstruction of the establishment of causes.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa dang ldan pa dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams skye ba la gal te bar du gcod pa nye bar gnas par gyur na skye bar mi 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin du 'thob pa dang grub par 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa dang ldan pa dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams skye ba la gal te bar du gcod pa nye bar gnas par gyur na skye bar mi 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin du 'thob pa dang grub par 'gyur ba dang /
translated: Thus, if an obstruction were to occur to the arising of any phenomenon associated with the desire realm, the form realm, the formless realm, or that which is neither, then it would not arise.

original: grub pa dang gnas pa dang byed pa la yang de de dang 'dra ba'i phyir te /üîΩde bas na par du gcod pa la brten nas mi mthun pa'i rgyu 'dogs so //
analyzed: grub pa dang gnas pa dang byed pa la yang de de dang 'dra ba'i phyir te / de bas na par du gcod pa la brten nas mi mthun pa'i rgyu 'dogs so //
translated: Similarly, it would not be obtained or accomplished.üîΩAnd it would not be accomplished, endure, or function.üîΩTherefore, a non-conducive cause is imputed in dependence upon an obstruction.

original: de la rgyu'i gnas par du gcod pa ma yin pa la brten nas mi mthun pa med pa'i rgyu 'dogs par byed de /
analyzed: de la rgyu'i gnas par du gcod pa ma yin pa la brten nas mi mthun pa med pa'i rgyu 'dogs par byed de /
translated: A non-conducive cause is imputed in dependence upon a non-obstruction of a cause.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: @83b 'di ltar 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa dang ldan pa dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams skye ba la gal te bar du gcod pa ma yin par nye bar gnas par gyur na de dag skye ba dang / de bzhin du 'thob pa dang grub par 'gyur ba dang grub pa dang /
analyzed: @83b 'di ltar 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa dang ldan pa dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams skye ba la gal te bar du gcod pa ma yin par nye bar gnas par gyur na de dag skye ba dang / de bzhin du 'thob pa dang grub par 'gyur ba dang grub pa dang /
translated: Thus, if phenomena associated with the desire realm, form realm, and formless realm, as well as those that are not associated with any realm, are present without obstructing the arising of other phenomena, then they will arise.

original: gnas pa dang byed pa la yang de dang 'dra ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: gnas pa dang byed pa la yang de dang 'dra ba'i phyir te /
translated: Similarly, they will be obtained, accomplished, and will remain.

original: de bas na bar du gcod pa ma yin pa la brten nas de mi mthun pa med pa'i rgyu 'dogs te /
analyzed: de bas na bar du gcod pa ma yin pa la brten nas de mi mthun pa med pa'i rgyu 'dogs te /
translated: Therefore, the designation of a cause that is not incompatible with the arising of other phenomena is made in dependence upon that which does not obstruct.

original: de ni rgyu'i rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni rgyu'i rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
translated: This is the presentation of the cause.

original: de la rkyen gyi rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na /üîΩrkyen gyi gnas bag chags dang rlan dang bcas pa'i sa bon la brten nas rgyu'i rkyen 'dogs par byed do //
analyzed: de la rkyen gyi rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na / rkyen gyi gnas bag chags dang rlan dang bcas pa'i sa bon la brten nas rgyu'i rkyen 'dogs par byed do //
translated: What is the presentation of conditions?üîΩThe designation of the causal condition is made in dependence upon the seed that is the basis of conditions, together with its latent impressions and moisture.

original: rkyen gyi gnas phrad nas 'gags pa la brten nas de ma thag pa'i rkyen 'dogs par byed do //
analyzed: rkyen gyi gnas phrad nas 'gags pa la brten nas de ma thag pa'i rkyen 'dogs par byed do //
translated: The designation of the immediately preceding condition is made in dependence upon the cessation of the basis of conditions that has occurred through contact.

original: rkyen gyi gnas yul la brten nas dmigs pa'i rkyen 'dogs par byed do //
analyzed: rkyen gyi gnas yul la brten nas dmigs pa'i rkyen 'dogs par byed do //
translated: The objective condition is designated in dependence on the objective domain of conditions.

original: rkyen gyi gnas dbang po la sogs pa de las gzhan pa rnams la brten nas bdag po'i rkyen 'dogs par byed de /
analyzed: rkyen gyi gnas dbang po la sogs pa de las gzhan pa rnams la brten nas bdag po'i rkyen 'dogs par byed de /
translated: The dominant condition is designated in dependence on the other conditions, such as the sense faculties.

original: de ni rkyen gyi rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni rkyen gyi rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
translated: This is the presentation of the conditions.

original: de la 'bras bu'i rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'bras bu'i rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the presentation of the effects?

original: 'bras bu'i gnas bag chags la brten nas rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu 'dogs par byed do //üîΩ'bras bu'i gnas mthun pa la brten nas /
analyzed: 'bras bu'i gnas bag chags la brten nas rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu 'dogs par byed do // 'bras bu'i gnas mthun pa la brten nas /
translated: The ripened effect is designated in dependence on the foundation of the effect, which is the latent impressions.

original: rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu 'dogs par byad do //
analyzed: rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu 'dogs par byad do //
translated: The effect of natural out-flow is designated in dependence on the foundation of the effect, which is the similar type.

original: 'bras bu'i gnas de kho na lta ba la brten nas bral ba'i 'bras bu 'dogs par byed do //üîΩ'bras bu'i gnas skyes bu'i byed pa la brten nas /
analyzed: 'bras bu'i gnas de kho na lta ba la brten nas bral ba'i 'bras bu 'dogs par byed do // 'bras bu'i gnas skyes bu'i byed pa la brten nas /
translated: The effect of separation is designated in dependence on the foundation of the effect, which is the view of reality.

original: skyes bu'i byed pa'i 'bras bu 'dogs par byed do //
analyzed: skyes bu'i byed pa'i 'bras bu 'dogs par byed do //
translated: The effect of conscious effort is designated in dependence on the foundation of the effect, which is the activity of a person.

original: 'bras bu'i gnas de la gzhan rnams la brten nas bdag po'i 'bras bu 'dogs par byed do //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i gnas de la gzhan rnams la brten nas bdag po'i 'bras bu 'dogs par byed do //
translated: The other effects are designated as the dominant effect in relation to that effect.

original: de ni 'bras bu'i rnam par gzhag pa yin te /
analyzed: de ni 'bras bu'i rnam par gzhag pa yin te /
translated: This is the presentation of the effects.

original: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i rab tu dbye ba rnam par gzhag pa bshad zin to /
analyzed: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i rab tu dbye ba rnam par gzhag pa bshad zin to /
translated: The presentation of the classification of dependent origination has been explained.

original: // / de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i go rims rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: // / de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i go rims rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the presentation of the order of dependent origination?

original: srid pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis kyi go rims bstan pa ste /
analyzed: srid pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis kyi go rims bstan pa ste /
translated: It is the teaching of the order of the twelve members of dependent origination.

original: thog ma kho nar shes bya'i dngos po la rmongs pa ni ma rig pa'o //
analyzed: thog ma kho nar shes bya'i dngos po la rmongs pa ni ma rig pa'o //
translated: First, the thing that is to be known is confused by ignorance.

original: rmongs pa de nyid la log par mngon par 'du byed pa ni 'du byed rnams so //
analyzed: rmongs pa de nyid la log par mngon par 'du byed pa ni 'du byed rnams so //
translated: That very confusion is the false volition of formations.

original: log par mngon par 'du byed pas sems phyin ci log tu 'gyur ba ni rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: log par mngon par 'du byed pas sems phyin ci log tu 'gyur ba ni rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: By the false volition, the mind becomes perverted, which is consciousness.

original: sems @84a * //
analyzed: sems @84a * //
translated: The mind

original: phyin ci log tu gyur bas nying mtshams sbyor ba ni ming dang gzugs so //
analyzed: phyin ci log tu gyur bas nying mtshams sbyor ba ni ming dang gzugs so //
translated: perverted, the linking of consciousness is name-and-form.

original: nying mtshams sbyor bas dbang po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba ni skye mched drug go //üîΩdbang po yongs su rdzogs pa las yul la yongs su longs spyod par byed pa ni reg pa'o //
analyzed: nying mtshams sbyor bas dbang po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba ni skye mched drug go // dbang po yongs su rdzogs pa las yul la yongs su longs spyod par byed pa ni reg pa'o //
translated: The complete development of the faculties through the linking of consciousness is the six sense spheres.

original: yul la yongs su longs spyad pa las lhag par zhen par 'gyur ba ni tshor ba'o //
analyzed: yul la yongs su longs spyad pa las lhag par zhen par 'gyur ba ni tshor ba'o //
translated: From the complete development of the faculties, the experience of objects is contact.

original: lhag par zhen pa las de 'dod par 'gyur ba ni sred pa'o //
analyzed: lhag par zhen pa las de 'dod par 'gyur ba ni sred pa'o //
translated: From the experience of objects, the desire for them is craving.

original: 'dod nas yongs su tshol bas nyon mongs pa bsogs par 'gyur ba ni len pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod nas yongs su tshol bas nyon mongs pa bsogs par 'gyur ba ni len pa'o //
translated: From desire, there is the accumulation of afflictions through searching for objects of desire, which is grasping.

original: nyon mongs pa bsags pas yang srid pa sdug pa dang mi sdug pa'i las kun nas ldang ba ni srid pa'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa bsags pas yang srid pa sdug pa dang mi sdug pa'i las kun nas ldang ba ni srid pa'o //
translated: From the accumulation of afflictions, the arising of actions that are attractive or unattractive for the sake of future existence is becoming.

original: las bsags pa kun las ldang ba ni 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor bar sdug bsngal mngon pa ni skye ba'o //
analyzed: las bsags pa kun las ldang ba ni 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor bar sdug bsngal mngon pa ni skye ba'o //
translated: From the arising of actions, the manifestation of suffering in the five types of transmigration is birth.

original: sdug bsngal mngon par 'grub par byas pas lus yongs su 'gyur ba'i rgyu las byung ba'i sdug bsngal 'byung ba ni rga shi'o //
analyzed: sdug bsngal mngon par 'grub par byas pas lus yongs su 'gyur ba'i rgyu las byung ba'i sdug bsngal 'byung ba ni rga shi'o //
translated: From the manifestation of suffering, the arising of suffering that arises from the transformation of the body is aging and death.

original: yul yongs su 'gyur ba'i rgyu las byung ba'i sdug bsngal 'byung ba ni mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa dag yin te /
analyzed: yul yongs su 'gyur ba'i rgyu las byung ba'i sdug bsngal 'byung ba ni mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa dag yin te /
translated: The suffering that arises from the cause of the transformation of the object is sorrow, lamentation, pain, dejection, and despair.

original: de lta bas na bcom ldan 'das kyis yan lag bcu gnyis po de dag go rims rims kyis bstan to //
analyzed: de lta bas na bcom ldan 'das kyis yan lag bcu gnyis po de dag go rims rims kyis bstan to //
translated: Therefore, the Lord taught the twelve members in a sequence that accords with the order in which they occur.

original: go rims kyi rnam grangs gzhan yang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis las brtsams pa'i rkyen rnam pa gnyis yod de /
analyzed: go rims kyi rnam grangs gzhan yang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis las brtsams pa'i rkyen rnam pa gnyis yod de /
translated: There is another way of explaining the sequence of the members of dependent origination. There are two kinds of conditions for the twelve members of dependent origination:

original: lus kyi rkyen dang / yul la nye bar spyod pa'i rkyen no //
analyzed: lus kyi rkyen dang / yul la nye bar spyod pa'i rkyen no //
translated: the condition of the body and the condition of the enjoyment of objects.

original: de la lus kyi rkyen ni yan lag dang po drug gis bsdus te /
analyzed: de la lus kyi rkyen ni yan lag dang po drug gis bsdus te /
translated: The condition of the body is included in the first six members.

original: thog mar lus la bdag tu 'dzin pa la sogs pas rmongs pa ni ma rig pa'o //
analyzed: thog mar lus la bdag tu 'dzin pa la sogs pas rmongs pa ni ma rig pa'o //
translated: First, there is ignorance, which is the delusion of grasping the body as a self, and so on.

original: de nas las rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa sdug bsngal bar ma shes nas las byed pa ni 'du byed rnams so //
analyzed: de nas las rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa sdug bsngal bar ma shes nas las byed pa ni 'du byed rnams so //
translated: Then, there are the formative forces, which are the performance of actions without knowing that the results of actions will ripen as suffering.

original: las byas nas kyang de nyid la shas cher rjes su rtogs pa ni rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: las byas nas kyang de nyid la shas cher rjes su rtogs pa ni rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: Consciousness is the consciousness that is the principal factor in the experience of the results of karma.üîΩName-and-form is the name-and-form that is included in the future faculties that are produced by the karma associated with that consciousness.

original: de na grogs rnam par shes pa de dang ldan pa'i las kyi phyi ma la dbang po 'grub pas bsdus pa'i ming dang gzugs kyi sdug bsngal dang / dbang po longs su rdzogs pas bsdus pa'i skye mched drug gi sdug bsngal /
analyzed: de na grogs rnam par shes pa de dang ldan pa'i las kyi phyi ma la dbang po 'grub pas bsdus pa'i ming dang gzugs kyi sdug bsngal dang / dbang po longs su rdzogs pas bsdus pa'i skye mched drug gi sdug bsngal /
translated: The six sense bases are the six sense bases that are included in the complete faculties.

original: yul la longs spyod pas bsdus pas reg pa'i sdug bsngal rnam pa gsum mngon par 'grub ste /
analyzed: yul la longs spyod pas bsdus pas reg pa'i sdug bsngal rnam pa gsum mngon par 'grub ste /
translated: Contact is the three kinds of contact that are included in the experience of objects.

original: de ni lus kyi rkyen gyi dbang du byas pa'i go rims yin @84b no ;
analyzed: de ni lus kyi rkyen gyi dbang du byas pa'i go rims yin @84b no ;
translated: This is the order of the conditions in relation to the body.

original: / de la yul la nye bar spyod pa'i rkyen ni yan lag lhag ma drug gis bsdus te /
analyzed: / de la yul la nye bar spyod pa'i rkyen ni yan lag lhag ma drug gis bsdus te /
translated: The remaining six members are included in the condition of the experience of objects.

original: de ltar lus mngon par grub nas tshe 'di la yang reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la sred pa bskyed pa ni tshor ba dang sred pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar lus mngon par grub nas tshe 'di la yang reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la sred pa bskyed pa ni tshor ba dang sred pa yin no //
translated: Thus, after the body has been produced, in this life, feeling and craving are produced by the condition of contact.

original: de nas btsal ba'i sgo nas rnyed pa dang / bkur sti'i sgo nas tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs kyi sgo dang thar ba'i sgo nas 'dod pa longs su tshol ba'am /
analyzed: de nas btsal ba'i sgo nas rnyed pa dang / bkur sti'i sgo nas tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs kyi sgo dang thar ba'i sgo nas 'dod pa longs su tshol ba'am /
translated: Then, seeking by way of searching, one seeks pleasure by way of acquisition, by way of honor, by way of morality and ritual, and by way of liberation.

original: lus yongs su tshol ba'am /
analyzed: lus yongs su tshol ba'am /
translated: Or else, one seeks the body,

original: thar pa yongs su tshol ba yang rung ste /
analyzed: thar pa yongs su tshol ba yang rung ste /
translated: or else one seeks liberation.

original: yul la yongs su longs spyod pa'i rkyen dang ldan pa yongs su tshol bar byed pa ni len pa'o //
analyzed: yul la yongs su longs spyod pa'i rkyen dang ldan pa yongs su tshol bar byed pa ni len pa'o //
translated: The condition of the enjoyment of the object is seeking.

original: log par yongs su tshol bar byed pa nyon mongs pa rnams dang de sngon du 'gro ba'i las rnams byas shing bsags pa ni srid pa'o //
analyzed: log par yongs su tshol bar byed pa nyon mongs pa rnams dang de sngon du 'gro ba'i las rnams byas shing bsags pa ni srid pa'o //
translated: The performance and accumulation of the defilements which are the wrong seeking, and of the actions which precede it, is becoming.

original: srid pa'i dbang gis 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor bar lus mngon par 'grub pa ni skye ba'o //
analyzed: srid pa'i dbang gis 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor bar lus mngon par 'grub pa ni skye ba'o //
translated: The actualization of the body in the five destinies through the power of becoming is birth.

original: skyes nas rgas shing 'chi bar 'gyur ba ni rga shi ste de ni yul la nye bar spyod pa'i rkyen gyi dbang du byas pa'i go rims yin no //
analyzed: skyes nas rgas shing 'chi bar 'gyur ba ni rga shi ste de ni yul la nye bar spyod pa'i rkyen gyi dbang du byas pa'i go rims yin no //
translated: Aging and death are the aging and death of one who is born. This is the order according to the condition of the enjoyment of the object.

original: go rims kyi rnam grangs gzhan yang sems can gyi tshogs gsum yod de /
analyzed: go rims kyi rnam grangs gzhan yang sems can gyi tshogs gsum yod de /
translated: There are three types of beings:

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnam par dag pa 'dod pa rnams dang / 'jig rten pa'i rnam par dag pa 'dod pa rnams dang / yul lhur 'dzin pa rnams so //
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnam par dag pa 'dod pa rnams dang / 'jig rten pa'i rnam par dag pa 'dod pa rnams dang / yul lhur 'dzin pa rnams so //
translated: those who desire the supramundane pure state, those who desire the mundane pure state, and those who are devoted to objects.

original: de la dang po rnams ni dkar po'i phyogs rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i 'gog par byed cing nag po'i phyogs 'phel bar mi byed pas de dag la ni go rims rnam par gzhag tu yang med do //
analyzed: de la dang po rnams ni dkar po'i phyogs rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i 'gog par byed cing nag po'i phyogs 'phel bar mi byed pas de dag la ni go rims rnam par gzhag tu yang med do //
translated: The first type do not have a sequence, because they stop the pure side of dependent origination and do not increase the impure side.

original: gnyis pa rnams la ni bden pa rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mi shes pa ni ma rig pa yin no //
analyzed: gnyis pa rnams la ni bden pa rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mi shes pa ni ma rig pa yin no //
translated: For the second type, ignorance is not knowing the truths as they are.

original: dran pa la nye bar gnas shing bsod nams dang mi g-yo ba zag pa dang bcas pa bsgom pa las byung ba'i las byed pa ni 'du byed rnams so //
analyzed: dran pa la nye bar gnas shing bsod nams dang mi g-yo ba zag pa dang bcas pa bsgom pa las byung ba'i las byed pa ni 'du byed rnams so //
translated: Formations are the performance of actions that arise from meditation on merit, the unshakable, and the contaminated, while being mindful.

original: dran pa la nye bar gnas pa ma yin du zin kyang bsod nams ma yin pa las 'gyod pas yongs su bsgom pa'am /
analyzed: dran pa la nye bar gnas pa ma yin du zin kyang bsod nams ma yin pa las 'gyod pas yongs su bsgom pa'am /
translated: Even if he is not established in mindfulness, he is still established in the mental state of cultivation that is remorseful about non-meritorious actions,

original: 'gyod pa med pa'i lam mchog tu dgag pas yongs su bsgom pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas pa ni rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: 'gyod pa med pa'i lam mchog tu dgag pas yongs su bsgom pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas pa ni rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: or in the mental state of cultivation that is remorseful about the path of non-remorse.

original: des na snga ma bzhin du phyi ma la skye ba'i gnas tha ma dang 'bring dang khyad par du 'phags pa dag tu mthar gyis ming dang gzugs dang skye mched drug dang reg pas bsdus pa'i sdug bsngal rnam pa gsum mngon par grub par 'gyur ro //üîΩsems can @85a * //
analyzed: des na snga ma bzhin du phyi ma la skye ba'i gnas tha ma dang 'bring dang khyad par du 'phags pa dag tu mthar gyis ming dang gzugs dang skye mched drug dang reg pas bsdus pa'i sdug bsngal rnam pa gsum mngon par grub par 'gyur ro // sems can @85a * //
translated: Thus, as before, in the future, the three types of suffering included in name-and-form, the six sense spheres, and contact are established in the highest, middling, and lowest birth states.

original: gsum pa da ltar byung ba'i yul longs spyod pas byung ba'i tshor ba la gnas pa rnams kyis ni snga ma bzhin du yan lag drug po gzhan sred pa nas rga shi la thug pa rnams rim gyis 'byung bar blta bar bya ste /

original: chos dkon mchog gang zhe na /
analyzed: chos dkon mchog gang zhe na /

original: rnam pa gsum ste /
analyzed: rnam pa gsum ste /

original: dge 'dun dkon mchog gang zhe na /
analyzed: dge 'dun dkon mchog gang zhe na /

original: de la sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun dkon mchog rnams kyi khyad par ni rnam pa drug gis rig par bya ste /
analyzed: de la sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun dkon mchog rnams kyi khyad par ni rnam pa drug gis rig par bya ste /
translated: The distinction of the Jewels Buddha, Dharma, and Sa·πÖgha is to be understood in six ways:

analyzed: mtshan nyid dang / phrin las dang / mos pa dang / sgrub pa dang / rjes su dran pa dang / bsod nams 'phel pas so //

analyzed: de la mtshan nyid las gyur pa'i khyad par ni sangs rgyas dkon mchog ni rang mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i mtshan @87a * //

analyzed: nyid do // chos dkon mchog ni mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid do //

analyzed: phrin las gyur ba'i khyad par ni sangs rgyas dkon mchog ni lung legs par 'bogs pa'i phrin las can no //

analyzed: chos dkon mchog ni nyon mongs pa dang sdug bsngal spong ba la dmigs pa'i phrin las can no //

analyzed: chos dkon mchog ni mngon du bya ba la gus pas zhen par bya'o //

original: chos dkon mchog ni legs par gsungs pa yang dag par mthong ba nad med pa dus chad pa med pa nye bar ston pa 'di mthong ba la don yod pa mkhas pa rnams kyis rang gis rig par bya ba yin no zhes rnam pa gzhan gyis rjes suüîΩdran par bya'o //

translated: What are the factors of enlightenment?
